name: Featherweight 2i Dryer with Brush
product_description:
Introducing the next generation of hair drying, T3 presents Featherweight 2i Dryer contains an ion generator to enhance healthier drying so you can maintain healthy looking hair. Helping you to receive maximum benefits, the hair dryer contains innovative T3 Tourmaline and SoftAire technology.

SoftAire allows you to dry your hair quicker whilst reducing the appearance of damage, frizz and flyaways. The hair tool has a tourmaline feature that, when heated, emits negative ions and healthy infra-red heat. Featuring 2 speed and 3 heat settings, you can style hair in a way that suits you. The hair dryer also comes with a Tourmaline Barrel brush to help you style your hair even more beautifully. -SA

name: Nine Original Iron
product_description:
The Cloud Nine Iron got the beauty industry buzzing – and rightly so. Suitable for all hair types, they use state-of-the-art temperature control technology, allowing you to create a multitude of exciting looks, without having to use searing heat.
Whether you want to smooth, flick, curl or straighten your hair – you can with this Cloud Nine Iron at a lower temperature than you ever thought possible. The added beauty of less heat? Less damage to your hair. This is a straightener that’s packed with incredible features. From the simple-to-follow temperature gauge, to the hibernation mode and swivel cord, it has everything you need to make the most of your style. What's more, its unique black plates provide added shine every time you use them.
The unique features of the Cloud Nine Iron include:

name: Featherweight Mini Compact Hair Dryer - Pink
product_description:
Achieve a salon-style finish with the T3 Featherweight Mini Compact Hair Dryer in pink. Lightweight yet powerful, the foldable design is ideal for travelling so you can experience a perfect blow dry on-the-go. The numerous heat and speed settings can be altered and the cold shot button allows you to create your desired hair style with professional results.
Patented Tourmaline® technology is combined with a unique SoftAire™ airflow design to reduce frizz and enhance shine, whilst sealing cuticles to retain moisture. The specially engineered fan generates ion-enriched air which is gently emitted through the slim nozzle in a wide cone shape, allowing you to dry large sections of hair quickly. Suitable for all hair types and textures, the negative ions effectively prevent static and frizz to leave locks calm, manageable and silky smooth.

name: LUNA™ go for Sensitive Skin
product_description:
Treat and transform skin with the FOREO LUNA™ go, a compact, travel-friendly facial-cleansing device designed to provide a professional standard of skincare with its invigorating one-minute ritual. Specially tailored to treat sensitive skin, the facial brush inspires a healthier-looking complexion; helping to gently clear and clarify for a luminous glow.
Combining T-Sonic™ Pulsation Technology with soft, specially customised silicone touch-points, the device gently yet effectively cleanses and exfoliates with a single intensity; its soft, non-porous touch points perform a gentle cleanse on sensitive skin, lifting away dirt, oil and makeup residue for a fresher complexion. Flexible and easy to use, the silicone 'bristles' are ultra-hygienic and resist bacteria build-up to keep skin fresh and clean.
Embedded with a high-technology Anti-Ageing Mode, the cleanser directs lower-frequency pulsations to wrinkle-prone areas to help smooth and firm the appearance of skin. 100% waterproof, the device is safe for use in the bath or shower. Complete with a travel pouch to keep it clean and ready to use.
Product Features:
Up to 30 uses per each full charge.
1 pulsation intensity.
Ultra-hygienic.
Fully waterproof for use in shower.
Targeted for specific skin type.
No replacement brushes required.
2-Year Limited Warranty and 10-Year Quality Guarantee.

name: TOUCH Permanent Hair Remover
product_description:
Clinically proven to permanently eliminate unwanted hair, the IluminageTOUCH Permanent Hair Remover is FDA-cleared for all skin tones and safe for use on the face and body. Developed with breakthrough, patented elōs technology that combines Intense Pulsed Light (IPL) and Radio Frequency (RF), the tool allows you to achieve smooth, hair-free skin without pain.
With a process that lasts as little as thirty minutes, the device automatically glides and emits pulses of bright white flashes to indicate when treatment has started, and the elōs energy levels can be altered for a low, medium or high intensity removal process. The only in-home treatment that delivers permanent hair reduction. E.N.
Specifications:Dimensions: H:11cm x W:18 x L:18cmWeight: 1kg

name: Big Hair Airstyler (42mm) - Black/Pink
product_description:
Achieve salon style results with the Big Hair Airstyler from BaByliss, a brand that combines high fashion styling with outstanding quality. Designed with a 42mm rotating ceramic barrel and two revolving speeds to add body and bounce to fringes, shorter hair and longer locks with layers. Featuring advanced ionic technology to control static and frizz, the wand transforms dull and limp hair into voluminous, silky locks.
The styling tool has two heat settings, one for initial drying and the low heat to style hair. Additional features include a cool setting to set your desired hair style for a long-lasting, professional finish and a multi-directional brush with soft bristles to create fullness and smoothen locks. Complete with a protective cover for storage. E.N.

name: Tight Curls Wand - Red
product_description:
Achieve bouncy, defined ringlets with the BaByliss Tight Curls Wand. Featuring a chic red design, the wand has an ultra slim 10mm ceramic coated barrel to help you create gorgeous lasting styles.
Suitable for all hair types, it offers super-fast heat up speeds up to 210°C with variable settings from 120°C to create the looks you want with ease. Set on a 2.5m salon-style swivel cord, it’s flexible and easy to use with an elongated barrel ideal for longer hair to creating concise, tight waves.
It automatically shuts off after a period of time without use and the integrated heat rest and provided heat mat protect surfaces from damage, plus it comes with a heat-resistant glove to help prevent minor burns.
Please Note: Supplied with a UK three pin plug.

name: London BareFaced Vibra-Sonic™ Daily Cleansing Brush - Rose Quartz
product_description: Firm and tighten your complexion with the Magnitone London BareFaced Vibra-Sonic™ Daily Cleansing Brush, a powerful tool that delivers a deep pore-cleansing action for radiant, refined skin. Effectively exfoliates the skin's surface to eliminate excess oil, dead skin cells, dirt and impurities, whilst improving the absorption of moisturising and skincare products to take the 'dare' out of going bare. The soft brush is gentle to skin and the innovative, double award-winning Vibra-Sonic™ technology combines energising sonic oscillations and electromagnetic pulsed vibrations to boost micro-circulation and tone skin for a plump appearance and healthy-looking glow. With a completely waterproof design, the brush features an on/off button, wireless USB charger and Pulselift™ Toning Mode for a feathery-soft, sixty second skin workout.

name: Sorbie Keratin + Argan 230C Salon Straightener
product_description:
Say hello to smooth and sleek hair with the Trevor Sorbie Keratin + Argan 230ºC Salon Straightener. With variable temperature settings from 80°C to 230°C to suit all hair types, it also features rapid heat up and recovery, meaning it's ready to use in 15 seconds.
The keratin and argan ceramic floating plates produce a smooth, snag-free finish with reduced frizz, whilst the automatic shut off function which activates after ten minutes helps to prevent overheating. - L.M.

name: Sorbie Keratin and Argan Curls and Waves Multi Styler - Black
product_description:
Mix up your hair styling with the Trevor Sorbie Keratin and Argan Curls and Waves Multi Styler, a hair curling wand with a trio of attachments to create diverse looks. It offers a fast heat-up time up to 200°C, while the three attachments are easy to use and change, perfect for creating tight spiral ringlets, beachy waves and glamorous curls.
Each barrel has been infused with Kertain and Argan oils to ensure a smooth, static-free finish that conditions hair as it styles. With a 3m swivel cord, you can achieve glossy, salon-style results from the comfort of your own home.

name: PRO Ceramic Hot Brush (13Mm)
product_description: Get salon styled hair with the quick heating Babyliss Pro Ceramic Hot Brush (13mm). The ceramic coated brush lets you create curls, volume and shape to your hair with instant results. The Babyliss Pro Ceramic Hot Brush (13mm) has been designed with a ceramic coated barrel to leave hair soft and smooth after styling. A non slip handle allows you to have full control whilst styling, with the long swivel cord allowing easy movement. The soft brush bristles are replaceable giving the styler a long life. And a multi voltage means you can have perfectly styled hair around the world.

name: Superturbo 3000 Black
product_description:
Ergonomically designed, the Parlux Superturbo 3000 - Black will give you maximum control whilst you dry your hair. With an airflow of 69 cubic metres/hour and a long-life, 1810 watt motor, the dryer features 2 speed and four temperature settings, making it suitable for all hair types.
It also comes with two nozzle attachments that will set your style and allow for fast, efficient drying. Weighing 1kg, the dryer boasts a flexible 3 metre cable and strong, durable casing that will allow it to stand the test of time. - L.M.
Please Note: Supplied with a UK 3 pin plug only.

name: Youth Activator
product_description:
Transform the look of your skin with iluminage Youth Activator Facial Device, a professional strength beauty tool that delivers a facelift effect in the comfort of your own home.
Inspired by professional technology used by doctors, the easy-to-use, anti-ageing device helps to rebuild healthy collagen and reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines for a noticeably firmer, smoother-looking complexion.
How does it work?
The device utilises three different energy types to help lift, firm and smooth the appearance of wrinkles: Radio Frequency, Red Light and Infra-Red LED. The Red Light and Infra-Red LED work in synergy to smoothen the look of wrinkles and lines, whilst Radio Frequency delivers thermal energy into skin to encourage collagen and elastin production. Designed to be used in conjunction with Youth Activator Contouring Serum, which ensures the Radio Frequency is delivered deep into skin for maximum results.
Results?
After use, skin appears noticeably firmer with smoother wrinkles and more sculpted and toned-looking facial contours.

name: Powerlight 385 - Mint
product_description:
Achieve the ultimate blow dry with the Powerlight 385 Hair Dryer from Parlux, a a brand that creates professional tools with outstanding quality, performance and reliability. With a K-LAMINATION® 2150W motor and built-in silencer, the dryer is both quiet and powerful to make blow drying quicker.
The eco-friendly hair dryer gives out no harmful emissions and boasts a convenient three metre cable and ergonomic handle for comfort and balance. Its lightweight, compact design features ionic and ceramic technology to control static and frizz, without stripping moisture to leave hair smooth, calm and manageable. The numerous temperature and speed settings can be altered as desired and the cold shot button can be used to create salon-style results. E.N.
Please Note: Supplied with a UK 3 pin plug only.

name: 3200 Compact Hair Dryer - Pink
product_description:
The Parlux 3200 Compact Hair Dryer in Pink is without doubt, the most widely used professional hairdryer on the market today. With the introduction of the revolutionary K-Lamination motor it’s lighter, more durable and more powerful.
Not only is the Parlux 3200 Compact Hair Dryer in Pink a favourite amongst leading salons, but it is perfect for everyday home use as well! The professional AC motor affords the 3200 dryer an airflow of 69 cubic metres/hour, which makes the Parlux 3200 compact one of the most powerful, professional hairdryers in the world.
The Parlux 3200 Compact Hair Dryer has incredible power but weighs in at only 490 grams and measures a tiny 20cm, which helps in reducing operating fatigue - a common problem with heavier hairdryers. All Parlux professional dryers are fitted as standard with three metre hairdryer cables, and feature a carefully crafted handle which has been designed for perfect balance, easy use and greater control of the dryer. Legendary Parlux reliability comes as standard.
Please Note: Supplied with a UK 3 pin plug only.

name: Deluxe Chrome Pro Mains Clipper
product_description:
Achieve barber quality results in the comfort of your own home with the Wahl Deluxe Chrome Pro Mains Clipper. Made with high-carbon steel blades, it powerfully yet quietly glides over your head for effective clipping.
The 29 piece set features a selection of tools to help you maintain your regime at home, including nasal and compact trimmers for a fully groomed look.

name: 810 Facial Epilator and Cleansing Brush
product_description:
Break free from skin imperfections with Braun’s 810 Facial Epilator and Cleansing Brush; one device that helps you to remove facial hair by the root with an epilator or cleanse skin pore deep with a facial brush. The tool features a sleek, compact design for absolute control and precision when removing hair and cleansing. 
The epilator can be used to precisely remove facial hair from the chin, upper lip, forehead and eyebrows and with 200 plucking motions per second, the epilator makes hair removal more thorough than manual tweezers. Hair is removed from the root for up to four weeks of hair-free skin.
Simply switch attachments from the epilator to the cleansing brush head to begin pore deep cleansing. The cleansing brush refines and exfoliates with micro-oscillations, helping to remove make-up and impurities to result in refreshed, radiant skin. The device is also 100% waterproof, allowing you to use it whilst in the shower.

name: Precise Touch Permanent Hair Remover
product_description:
Discover the only at home permanent hair removal device from Iluminage.
FDA cleared for all skin tones and safe for use on the face and body, the IluminageTOUCH Permanent Hair Reduction allows you to keep unwanted hair at bay with high levels of satisfaction and little to no pain - when compared with professional laser hair removal techniques.
Utilising elōs technology, the device combines a light modality with radio frequency to treat more skin types with little down time and unparalleled safety. Its light pulses indicate when treatment has started, and the energy level can be altered for a low, medium or high intensity hair removal treatment.
Safe and uniquely designed for facial hair removal below the cheek line. - K.N.
Height: 11cm.
Width: 18cm.
Length: 18cm.
Weight: 1kg.

name: Personal Microderm - International
product_description:
Say hello to smooth, glowing skin with the PMD Personal Microderm - International. Using a vacuum suction and a rotating aluminium oxide crystal disc to exfoliate away dead skin cells, it also stimulates collagen production and reduces the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, age spots, hyperpigmentation and enlarged pores.
With four levels of exfoliating discs and two speed settings for complete control of intensity, the tool replicates the microdermabrasion treatment that's given by professionals. Suitable for all skin types, it will leave your skin feeling soft, smooth and retexturised, and ready to absorb skin care products more effectively. - L.M.

name: Sorbie Keratin and Argan 235°C Power Straightener - Rose Gold
product_description:
The Trevor Sorbie Keratin and Argan 235°C Power Straightener allows you to achieve salon-style results quickly and from the comfort of your own home. Suitable for all hair types, the straighteners offer ceramic floating plates that have been infused with an Argan and Keratin Complex to enhance shine, vitality and smoothness.
It heats up in just 10 seconds and has a rapid heat recovery system to ensure long-lasting styles even when you’re short on time, plus the digital temperature control and variable heat settings allow you to customise styling. The Frizz Reduction System combats fly-aways and smooths the hair follicle, leaving locks poker-straight and ultra-shiny. Complete with a 3m swivel cord and rose gold-toned details for a luxe edge.

name: 380-3 Shaver
product_description:
Perfect for wet and dry shaving, the Braun 380-3 Shaver will allow you to achieve a close and comfortable shave. With Sensofoil foils that will easily cut hairs whilst gliding across your skin to minimise irritation, the shaver also has a Triple Action FreeFloat System which incorporates three independently moving cutting elements which adapt to your facial contours to cut both long and short hairs, as well as a Triple Action Cutting System which features twin foils and an integrated middle trimmer to shave progressively closer.
Completely washable and waterproof, it also comes with long hair trimmer which is ideal for sideburns and moustaches, whilst the battery status indicator will let you know when it's ready to be charged. A one hour charge will provide 45 minutes of cordless use, and there's also a five minute quick charge function which will create enough power for one shave. - L.M.

name: Professional Styling Intelligent Digital Argan Wand (45-22mm)
product_description:
The Feel the Heat Intelligent Digital Argan Wand (45-22mm) from Diva Professional is the perfect curling companion for all hair types. Give yourself the largest drop waves or curls with the Argan Oil infused wand, for sleek and silky curls that look and feel much healthier compared to using other heated styling wands.
The Intelligent Digital Argan Wand (45-22mm) features:
- Instant heat up technology.- Controllable digital heat settings from 110°C to 210°C. - Argan Oil infused wand for smooth, glossy hair.- Auto power-off after an hour of no use. - Built-in heat protection stand.
The heat system within the wand ensures it is heated throughout, for perfectly balanced drop curls every time. - K.R

name: Sorbie Keratin + Argan Magnetic Multi-Wand
product_description:
Achieve big and bouncy waves and curls with the Trevor Sorbie Keratin + Argan Magnetic Multi-Wand. Suitable for all hair types, it features varying temperature settings between 160°C and 200°C, whilst the three magnetic attachments are easy to use and change.
With a curling wand, waving wand and drop curl wand, it features keratin and argan ceramic barrels for a smooth and snag-free finish. There's also an automatic shut off function to prevent overheating. - L.M.

Features:

name: E-Styler Hair Straightening Brush - Sugar Plum
product_description:
Reveal sleek and straight locks with the ikoo E-Styler Hair Straightening Brush. Designed to simultaneously brush and straighten hair, the styler is constructed with 37 individual ceramic plates, which ensure even heat application to hair without the need for any additional styling tools. The styler’s bristles glide through hair with minimal resistance, delivering tug and pain free styling, alongside straight and shiny results.
Heating up in just 1-2 minutes, the brush boasts five varying temperature settings, which allow you to tailor your styling experience specifically to your hair type. The settings range from 150-230 °C, suitable for both fine and thick tresses. Automatically shutting off after 30 minutes, the styler is safe and simple to use.
Expect straight hair that is free from tangles and flyaways, whilst boasting a silky, shiny and satin-like finish.

name: PRO Perfect Curl
product_description: BaByliss Pro Perfect Curl creates waves or curls in your hair, quickly and easily and without pulling. The BaByliss Pro Perfect Curl has three temperature settings and three timer settings. Select the curl direction, then simply grasp a section of hair near the roots, then close and hold the wand. The whole length of the hair is drawn into the ceramic curl chamber and after a few seconds, a beep will tell you when it is time to release the hair. Repeat on the next section of hair. The result will be soft even waves, or tight defined curls - or somewhere in between, depending on your preference and the setting you choose.

name: 3500 Super Compact Ionic Hair Dryer - Black
product_description:
The Parlux 3500 Super Compact Ceramic Ionic Hair Dryer is exceptionally small and remarkably powerful. The combination of ceramic coated components and negative ion production dry at super fast speed, without drying out the hair’s external structure.
The incredible technology within the Parlux 3500 Super Compact Ceramic Ionic Hair Dryer preserves the natural moisture in your hair, making it shinier, softer and healthier. Neutralising static electricity and leaving hair silky, the Parlux 3500 is light, balanced, quiet and just 17cm in size. To meet the needs of today’s professional stylists and discerning home users, Parlux has created the 3500 to provide greater durability, higher power, lighter weight and smaller dimensions. Never before have all these goals been achieved in a single appliance – the Parlux 3500 Super Compact Ionic Hair Dryer!
All Parlux professional dryers are fitted as standard with three metres hairdryer cables, and feature a carefully crafted handle which has been designed for perfect balance, easy use and greater control of the dryer. Legendary Parlux reliability comes as standard.
Please Note: Supplied with a UK 3 pin plug only.

name: Powerlight 385 - Diffuser
product_description: This professional diffuser is perfect for adding volume or creating curls and waves and is designed for use with the Parlux Powerlight 385 hair dryer. Simply snapping on tightly to the hair dryer's barrel, it is made from a heat resistant plastic and boasts an advanced clip design meaning it won't slip off during use. Simple and easy to use, this diffuser distributes heat evenly throughout the hair and is ideal for creating movement that lasts all day. - E.D

The Wahl 100 Series Mains Clipper is an easy way to cut, shape and define your hair. The 11 piece set contains everything you need to maintain your style in the comfort of your own home, including four different grade attachments, hair dressing scissors, a styling comb, cleaning brush and oil.
The quiet yet powerful high carbon steel-bladed clippers give extra sharpness and are long-lasting, whilst the adjustable taper lever allows you to achieve the perfect angle giving you salon-quality results every time.

name: FG1100 Bikini Trimmer

Boasting a slim and compact design, it's discreet enough to take away with you when you travel. Battery operated, the trimmer can also be used on facial hair, underarms and any other sensitive area. - L.M.

name: Professional Styling Universal Diffuser XXL Pro
product_description:
Add volume and waves to locks with the Universal Diffuser XXL Pro from Diva Professional Styling. Delivering an extra boost to your blow dry, the diffuser is uniquely designed to fit any hairdryer. Suitable for long, short, thick or thin barrels, the universal diffuser boasts a soft grip that will hold it into place securely.
The diffuser is crafted with an extra deep, XXL bowl, designed for maximum hair capture. Soft rubber tips deliver volume and lift at the roots of hair, resulting in locks that look thicker, full bodied and volumised.

name: Time Control Anti-Ageing Cosmetic Instrument for Eyes Contouring
product_description:
Reverse visible signs of ageing with the Talika Time Control Anti-Ageing Cosmetic Instrument for Eyes Contouring.
Developed utilising extensive aerospace research, this is a light therapy device that has been specifically designed for use around the delicate eye area.
The patented ionotherapy system emits two wavelengths (590 and 630nm) of orange and red lights with imperceptible micro-currents that work in synergy to stimulate the fibrolasts, replenish natural collagen production and combat everyday micro-inflammations that accelerate the ageing process.  
Offering precise and targeted treatment, micro-vibrations stimulate cellular renewal, with the instrument seeking to smooth the appearance of wrinkles, alleviate the look of dark circles and combat puffiness without causing irritation or discomfort. Suitable for daily use, the handheld device leaves the eye contour feeling firmer and more refined with visible results after as little as two weeks.

name: Abs Belt S7 Toner
product_description:
Slendertone Abs S7 offers the greatest intensity (up to 150) and number of programmes (10). Within those programmes, there are 7 passive programmes (no physical activity required) and 3 active programmes (use the belt while doing exercise).
* Slendertone ab belts must be used as per the guidelines stated in the instruction manual. For best results, we recommend that you use your Slendertone belt in conjunction with a normal, healthy diet and exercise.
All Slendertone products undergo rigorous clinical trials. Slendertone Abs S7 is clinically proven for a firmer and flatter stomach in 4 weeks:
*Clinical trial conducted by Dr. John Porcari, University of Wisconsin, La-Crosse. Flex & Walking (University of Ulster).

name: PRO Speed 2200 Hair Dryer - Black/Blue
product_description:
Achieve the perfect blow dry with the Pro Speed 2100 Hair Dryer from BaByliss, a brand that combines high fashion styling with outstanding quality. The dryer has a sleek and compact design along with a swivel cord to prevent tangling. Designed with ceramic heat-balancing technology to add shine and a high performance 2100W motor to make blow drying quicker.
Featuring advanced ionic technology to control static and frizz, the dryer works by transforming dull and limp hair into calm, silky locks. Hair will be smooth and manageable thanks to the ultra slim concentrator nozzle which allows precise styling for flawless results. The numerous heat and speed settings can be altered and the cold shot button can be used to create your desired hair style with a professional, salon-style finish. E.N.

name: Sorbie Keratin and Argan Tong (32mm)
product_description:
Produce gorgeously glossy even curls with the Trevor Sorbie Keratin and Argan Tong. The 32mm barrel is coated with keratin and argan oil, to keep hair more protected, shiny and healthier compared to other heated styling tools.
The Trevor Sorbie Keratin and Argan Tong (32mm) features:
The adjustable heat settings allow you to experiment and change your style each time; the higher the temperature the tighter the curl achieved. - K.R

name: MPT3800 Detail Trimmer
product_description: Perfect for hair removal emergencies Remington MPT3800 Detail Trimmer features a dual blade that helps you stay in control of your stray hairs and eyebrows. The trimmer has a compact pen design and a handy built-in light to reveal even the finest of hairs. Working to handle the contours of your face, the flexible head is perfect for smaller areas of your body by gently trimming away longer or stray hairs. The trimmer also features a comb at two length settings to give you a professional groomed result. -SA

name: PRO Ceramic Dial-a-Heat Tong (32mm)
product_description:
The unique ceramic barrel built into the BaByliss Pro Ceramic Dial-a-Heat Tongs heats up quickly to give a smooth, shiny finish. Distributing heat evenly to produce natural curls, this 32mm styler produces medium, gorgeous waves.
Featuring 25 temperature settings for total styling control, the BaByliss Pro Ceramic Dial-a-Heat Tongs have a heat-ready indicator system, to let you know just as soon as they’re ready rock! With a cool tip and integrated safety stand, these super-safe, super-stylish tongs will have you turning heads!

name: Freestyler
product_description:
Achieve professional results with the Glamoriser Freestyler. With a lightweight, compact size that fits perfectly into your handbag, its cordless design allows you to get a salon style finish any time, anywhere.
Featuring floating ceramic plates with a high gloss coating, the styler effortlessly glides through the hair without snagging. Infused with Black Diamond Oil, the plates enhance shine to leave you with sleek, luminous locks.
With an ultra fast heat up time, the Freestyler is ready for use in just 120 seconds and its variable heat settings are able to reach 200°C. Whether you need to completely style your hair or touch-up throughout the day, the styler delivers up to forty minutes use and comes complete with a travel lock and pouch, ideal for using on-the-go. E.N.

name: London Brush Cleanser Soap Star 30g
product_description: Lottie London's 'Soap Star' Brush Cleanser effectively eliminates the build-up of make-up and invisible impurities for improved brush performance. Keeping brushes sanitary is important for both your complexion and the brush itself, so ensure they receive their deep cleanse with this softening, coconut oil infused formula. Quick and safe to use. E.N.

name: SinglePass Flat Iron Straighteners
product_description:
Straighten, flip and curl with T3 Single Pass Flat Iron Straighteners. The styling product has digital SinglePass Technology, which temperature can be adjusted to 232°C, helping you to maintain optimum heat level.
Working to help you achieve super-sleek, straight hair, polished curls or cascading waves, the styling iron helps you to create damage-free looks. SinglePass teams with Tourmaline technology to deliver accurate and consistent heat to seal the cuticle in just one smooth pass. Hair is left protected from overheating and over styling.

name: Hair Removal Laser 4X - Fuchsia
product_description:
Achieve soft, smooth skin with Tria Hair Removal Laser 4X, a clinically-proven, cordless hair removal device that works to reduce up to 70% of unwanted hair after just 2 treatments in as few as 3 months.
Dermatologist recommended, the innovative device safely and effectively removes hair with FDA-cleared laser technology; it utilises the same diode laser technology preferred by dermatologists to target and permanently disable the hair follicle for permanent results*, and has 3 times more hair eliminating energy than any other at home device.
Suitable for most hair and skin tones, the professional device is fast, powerful and easy to use; its interactive LED display guides you through each treatment for optimum results, and its longer battery life makes it ideal for covering multiple face and body parts during each treatment.
Expect soft, smooth skin with long term results.
After 2-3 months of treatment, hair growth will appear lighter and finer. After 3 months of treatment, hair follicles that have been deactivated will no longer grow hair. Continue to use as necessary for touch-ups.
Product Features:
Safe and easy hair removal.
Permanent results.
Clinically-proven.
FDA-cleared laser technology.
Cordless.
LED display.
30 minute battery life.
Easy grip handle.

name: Personal Microderm International - Teal
product_description:
Achieve a luminous glow wherever you are with the PMD Personal Microderm International, a revolutionary tool developed to restore a youthful-looking complexion. Inspired by professional microdermabrasion treatments, the award-winning device uses a calibrated vacuum suction to increase circulation and blood flow, whilst stimulating the natural production of collagen and elastin, leaving skin firmer, tighter and radiant.
The patented spinning disc with aluminium oxide crystals exfoliates dead skin cells and smoothens the skin's surface without manual scrubbing, minimising the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, blemishes and enlarged pores. With four levels of exfoliating discs and two speed settings, the tool stimulates cell renewal, evens skin tone and texture and enhances the benefits of skincare products. E.N.

name: Powerlight 385 - Black
product_description:
Featuring a built in silencer, the black Parlux Powerlight 385 includes the same eco-friendly technology that the Parlux hairdryers are known for whilst being smaller and quieter than others in the range. Powerful, lightweight and boasting ceramic and ionic technology, this model doesn’t give out any harmful emissions and maintains hair’s moisture despite the use of heat. It also boasts a three metre cable, airflow of 79 cubic metres per hour and a carefully crafted handle which has been ergonomically designed for the perfect balance when styling. - E.D
Please Note: Supplied with a UK 3 pin plug only.

name: PRO Radiance Crimson Edition Hair Dryer - Red (2000W)
product_description:
This new, limited edition Pro Radiance Hair Dryer (2000W) by BaByliss comes in a beautiful crimson colour with a high gloss finish. Combining fast-drying results with ceramic-ionic conditioning, this stylish hair dryer will leave your hair smooth and shiny, preventing frizz and breakage.    
Featuring a long-life AC motor for an advanced airflow, the dryer is certain to deliver top results. The temperature and speed can be adjusted with 3 variable heat and 2 speed settings, whilst the added cold shot button allows you to create the perfect volume. 
Designed by professionals for professionals, the hair dryer has a streamlined design and is easy to clean and use. For maximum styling control! – N.P.

name: 7561 Silk-Épil 7 Epilator
product_description:
Braun present the 7561 Silk-Épil 7 Epilator; a cordless Wet and Dry Epilator that performs thorough hair removal, leaving silky soft skin. Designed specifically for epilation in warm water to improve your circulation and make your skin less sensitive, the epilator is waterproof and washable.
With 40 tweezers in close-grip technology, the epilator removes even the shortest, finest hairs right down to 0.5mm long. The epilator features a pivoting head, which smoothly adapts to your body contours, and SoftLift Tips, which effectively lift even flat-lying hair and help guise them to the tweezers for removal. A Smartlight also helps guise your way through the epilation and lightens up even the finest hairs.
Cordless and rechargeable, an adjustable speed setting allows you to select the right speed for your individual needs. – E.W.

name: ISSA™ mikro Toothbrush - Bubble Blue
product_description:
Catering specifically for babies aged 0-4 years, FOREO's ISSA™ mikro Toothbrush allows a safe, fun and healthy brushing routine and promotes stronger, healthier gums.
Combining non-abrasive, super-soft silicone bristles with Sonic Pulse Technology, the innovative, colourful device features two modes: a 'Brush' setting to cleanse delicate teeth and gums, and a 'Massage' option that relieves tenderness and teething pain with its gentle vibrations.
Lightweight and ergonomic for a non-slip, comfortable grip, the electric toothbrush has been crafted from bacteria-resistant, food-grade silicone for ultimate hygiene, whilst its encased one-piece design has no detachable parts or sharp edges for superior safety.
An integrated timer indicates when it is time to move to a different section of the mouth, and rewarding Smile Helpers ('Glee' and 'Glum') light up to track brushing time; encouraging even the youngest users to develop good dental care habits. Waterproof and dishwasher-safe for easy cleaning.

name: C3 Silver Paisley Hair Straightener
product_description:
Create perfectly styled hair with the Corioliss C3 Silver Paisley Hair Straightener. With extra long floating Titanium plates that glide effortlessly through your hair, the straighteners also boast negative ion technology that eliminates static for a silky soft finish.
Suitable for all hair types, the LED temperature control of 135-235°C allows you to find the perfect heat to match your hair type and styling needs. Producing lasting results whether you're straightening or adding waves to your hair, the styler also comes with a sleep mode that shuts it down after 30 minutes, so you can leave the house without having to worry if you've left your straighteners on. - L.M.Features:

name: Sorbie Stay Sharp Carbon Steel Professional Hair and Beard Grooming Set
product_description:
Trevor Sorbie Stay Sharp Carbon Steel Professional Hair and Beard Grooming Set boast a lightweight and ergonomic designed hair trimmer that delivers a barber quality grooming experience. Made with a quiet professional high power motor, the clippers have stay sharp stainless steel blades for a high precision cut.
The 5-in-1 hair clipper comes with a range of blades including: a beard trimmer, T blade hair trimmer, design trimmer, foil shaver and nose and ear hair trimmer. With five fine adjustment levels and four position detachable combs from 3-12mm, you can groom your hair exactly the way you like it. -SA

name: 9-561 Silk-Épil 9 Wet and Dry Epilator
product_description:
Braun present the 9-561 Silk-Épil 9 Wet and Dry Epilator; a cordless Epilator with MicroGrip tweezer technology that performs thorough hair removal, leaving long-lasting silky soft skin. 
With a 40% wider head, the epilator covers more area and removes more hair in one stroke. The watertight feature allows you to use it in the bath or shower for a gentler epilation and the device adapts to the contours of your skin for more comfort and maximum thoroughness. A Smartlight also helps guise your way through the epilation and lightens up even the finest hairs.
Cordless and rechargeable, an adjustable speed setting allows you to select the right speed for your individual needs. – E.W.
What’s in the Box?

name: Curl Pods
product_description:
Achieve flawless curls with BaByliss Curl Pods; the unique and easy way to achieve glamorous curls and sultry waves.
With an ultra-fast heat up system, each all-in-one pod eliminates the need for clips and pins whilst styling (easier than heated rollers!), and safely contains your hair to form the perfect curl; simply wrap your hair around the barrel and snap shut to keep hair in place. The results? Perfectly formed, kink free curls. The innovative pods maintain high heat performance and create curls fast, allowing you to witness beautiful results, every time. - K.N.

name: E-Styler Hair Straightening Brush - Fireball
product_description:
Reveal sleek and straight locks with the ikoo E-Styler Hair Straightening Brush. Designed to simultaneously brush and straighten hair, the styler is constructed with 37 individual ceramic plates, which ensure even heat application to hair without the need for any additional styling tools. The styler’s bristles glide through hair with minimal resistance, delivering tug and pain free styling, alongside straight and shiny results.
Heating up in just 1-2 minutes, the brush boasts five varying temperature settings, which allow you to tailor your styling experience specifically to your hair type. The settings range from 150-230 °C, suitable for both fine and thick tresses. Automatically shutting off after 30 minutes, the styler is safe and simple to use.
Expect straight hair that is free from tangles and flyaways, whilst boasting a silky, shiny and satin-like finish.

name: Colour Coded Cordless Clipper
product_description:
Ideal for the whole family, the Wahl Colour Coded Cordless Clipper is a convenient rechargeable hair clipper equipped with a colour coded key to help identify yours and your loved ones preferred cutting length.

Powered by a Powerdrive™ motor for superior cutting action, the high performance cordless clipper utilises self-sharpening precision-ground blades to tackle even the thickest of hair, and has a soft touch grip for comfort and control. Colour coded for easy comb identification, the flexible and convenient hair clipper delivers 60 minutes of power on one full charge, and is equipped with 12 guide combs ranging from 0.8mm - 2.5mm.

The Kit Contains:
Durable storage case, detail trimmer, cord, 12 guide combs, two combs, scissors and style guide.

Features:

name: Quasar MD PLUS
product_description:
Baby Quasar's MD PLUS is an anti-ageing infrared light therapy device equipped with collagen-building and elastin-strengthening red light technology to promote smoother, younger-looking skin in as little as eight weeks.
Boasting four times the power of other light treatment devices, and proving 50% more powerful than the Baby Quasar PLUS, the pain-free facial device combines different shades of red and amber LED lights with infrared light to expertly firm skin and smoothen the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles; medical science has proven that applying red and amber lights along with infrared light onto affected skin boosts the production of collagen and elastin. Its larger treatment head and 5mm LED lights enable quicker, more efficient treatment time with long-lasting results.
Completely safe, the light therapy treatment is dermatologist recommended and perfect for using at home with no reported side effects.

name: 3200 Compact Hair Dryer - Red
product_description:
The Parlux 3200 Compact Hair Dryer in Red is without doubt, the most widely used professional hairdryer on the market today. With the introduction of the revolutionary K-Lamination motor it’s lighter, more durable and more powerful.
Not only is the Parlux 3200 Compact Hair Dryer in Red a favourite amongst leading salons, but it is perfect for everyday home use as well! The professional AC motor affords the 3200 dryer an airflow of 69 cubic metres/hour, which makes the Parlux 3200 compact one of the most powerful, professional hairdryers in the world.
The Parlux 3200 Compact Hair Dryer has incredible power but weighs in at only 490 grams and measures a tiny 20cm, which helps in reducing operating fatigue - a common problem with heavier hairdryers. All Parlux professional dryers are fitted as standard with three metre hairdryer cables, and feature a carefully crafted handle which has been designed for perfect balance, easy use and greater control of the dryer. Legendary Parlux reliability comes as standard.
Please Note: Supplied with a UK 3 pin plug only.

name: Age-Defying Laser - Lilac
product_description:
Rediscover your skin's youthful capacity with the Tria Age-Defying Laser, a clinically proven, light-based, at-home skincare device that uses light technology to help improve skin's texture whilst combatting signs of ageing.
Created in collaboration with dermatologists and plastic surgeons, the anti-ageing device utilises the same technology as a professional clinic, allowing you to witness high performance results in the comfort of your own home. 
How Does it Work?
The device emits targeted beams of light that penetrate beneath the surface of skin to promote collagen and elastin production. Safe and effective for use on the forehead, cheeks and around the eyes, it delivers better anti-ageing results than any cream or serum, and will reduce the appearance of key signs of ageing, such as lines, stubborn wrinkles and discolouration; its patented technology keeps your collagen regenerating 24 hours a day. Promoting a more youthful-looking complexion in as little as two weeks, it will improve skin's clarity and bestow it with a natural glow, even when you're makeup-free.

name: Sorbie Stay Sharp Carbon Steel Professional Nose and Eyebrow Groomer
product_description:
Remove unwanted facial hair with the Professional Nose and Eyebrow Groomer from Trevor Sorbie. Perfect for precision trimming, the grooming tool features a stainless steel rotary blade that has been designed for the nose and eyebrows.
With an outward narrow aperture, the groomer can trim nasal hair in any direction so you can get rid of any unruly hairs. -SA

name: Digital Hot Brush - Lilac
product_description:
Sweep away tangles and frizz with the Corioliss Digital Hot Brush; an advanced, heated styling tool that delivers sleek and silky smooth results.  
Designed with ionic technology, it emits negative ions to combat frizz and enhance shine, with massaging bristles to effortlessly tackle knots. A variable temperature setting of up to 230°C allows superior results over regular brushing, working to relax kinks and effectively straighten hair in large sections. Tresses are left feeling soft and polished with gorgeous shine.

name: Quasar Pure Rayz for HIM - Sage
product_description:
Target wrinkles with the Baby Quasar Pure Rayz Anti-Ageing Light Therapy Device for Him; a scientifically advanced, anti-ageing system that’s powered by LED technology to help you achieve visibly younger looking skin.
One of the most powerful FDA-cleared light therapy tools available for home use, the handheld device emits completely harmless wavelengths of Red, Super Red, Amber and Infrared light that penetrate skin at different depths to help stimulate natural levels of collagen and elastin – the building blocks of supple, healthy-looking skin.     
Designed to treat the entire face, the gentle treatment effectively helps lift and smooth the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines over time, without causing irritation, inflammation or skin sensitivity to sunlight.
Clinically proven and dermatologically tested, the ergonomic and compact device is gentle enough for all skin types and easy to use from the comfort of your own home. Follow an eight week initial treatment and unveil a youthful looking complexion without fuss or stress, with only minimal touch-ups required for sustainable results.

name: AGELESS Throat Ionic Device
product_description:
Transform your anti-ageing skincare regime with the PRAI AGELESS Throat Ionic Device. Designed to be used in synergy with the AGELESS Throat Ionic Serum, the innovative tool utilises advanced Iontophoresis (Ionic) technology to deliver dramatic firming, lifting and smoothing effects.
Lightweight, portable and easy to use, it seeks to enhance the application of the serum and visibly reduce the look of wrinkles, lines and sagging. Skin feels softened, replenished and revitalised with redefined contours.

name: Lithium Ion Grooming Station
product_description:
Achieve precise and intricate grooming with the Wahl Lithium Ion Grooming Station. The trimmer features four interchangeable cutting heads, allowing you to style and shape your beard with ease, as well as remove unwanted hair from all over your body, whilst the 12 guide combs give you 12 cutting positions to choose from.
Perfect for busy men, it features a 1 minute power quickcharge, whilst the rechargeable lithium ion technology gives up to 150 minutes cordless use from a one hour charge.
Please Note: This product is supplied with UK plug.

name: PRO Nano Titanium Satin Straightener
product_description:
Using the latest in hair technology the Babyliss Pro Nano Titianium Satin Straightener gives your hair fantastic results. The advanced floating plates glide through your hair, so you can achieve a silky smooth finish faster.

The Babyliss Pro Nano Titianium Satin Straightener heats up quickly and features 5 heat settings that reach a top temperature of 230C. The lightweight styler has a long swivel cord that allows you to easily move around whilst styling your hair. You can style your hair sleek and straight or use the curved edge for fabulous curls.

name: London BareFaced Vibra-Sonic™ Daily Cleansing Brush - Pastel Pink
product_description:
Firm and tighten your complexion with the Magnitone London BareFaced Vibra-Sonic™ Daily Cleansing Brush, a powerful tool that delivers a deep pore-cleansing action for radiant, refined skin. Effectively exfoliates the skin's surface to eliminate excess oil, dead skin cells, dirt and impurities, whilst improving the absorption of moisturising and skincare products to take the 'dare' out of going bare.
The soft brush is gentle to skin and the innovative, double award-winning Vibra-Sonic™ technology combines energising sonic oscillations and electromagnetic pulsed vibrations to boost micro-circulation and tone skin for a plump appearance and healthy-looking glow. With a completely waterproof design, the brush features an on/off button, wireless USB charger and Pulselift™ Toning Mode for a feathery-soft, sixty second skin workout.

name: Advance Light Hair Dryer Diffuser Attachment
product_description:
Boost your blow dry with the Advance Light Hair Dryer Diffuser Attachment from Parlux. Crafted from heat-resistant plastic, the attachment is designed specifically to fit the Parlux Advance Light Ceramic Ionic Hair Dryer. The diffuser simply pushes on to the dryer barrel and fits securely, due to its advanced design.
Distributing heat through hair evenly, the Hair Dryer Diffuser creates luscious curls, waves and volume in an instant. Expect enviable locks.

name: 9095cc Series 9 Wet and Dry CC Shaver
product_description:
Achieve an efficient and comfortable shave with Braun’s most advanced shaver, the 9095cc Series 9 Wet and Dry Shaver. With SyncroSonic Technology that delivers 40,000 cross-cutting actions per minute, an outstandingly thorough shave and amazing skin comfort is accomplished.
Four flexible cutting elements that specialise in capturing different types of hair and a pivoting shaving head mean the device adapts to the skin’s contours, for maximum skin contact. The cordless shaver is also built with wet and dry technology, allowing you to have a refreshing shave whilst in the shower. A numerical LED display conveniently indicates the battery life and hygiene status.
The Wet and Dry CC Shaver is accompanied by a 5 Action Clean and Charge Station that provides full maintenance at the touch of a button. The base acts as a stand, but also charges, cleans, lubricates and dries the shaver so that it feels like new every day.

name: Powerlight 385 - Purple
product_description:
Featuring a built in silencer, the purple Parlux Powerlight 385 includes the same eco-friendly technology that the Parlux hairdryers are known for whilst being smaller and quieter than others in the range. Powerful, lightweight and boasting ceramic and ionic technology, this model doesn’t give out any harmful emissions and maintains hair’s moisture despite the use of heat. It also boasts a three metre cable, airflow of 79 cubic metres per hour and a carefully crafted handle which has been ergonomically designed for the perfect balance when styling. - E.D
Please Note: Supplied with a UK 3 pin plug only.

name: Chromepro 26Pce Mains Clipper
product_description:
Powerful yet quiet, the Wahl Chromepro 26Pce Mains Clipper allows to to maintain and trim your hair in the comfort of your own home. The mains operated multi cut clipper features high carbon steel blades, as well as Wahl's Powerdrive cutting system for optimum performance.
As well as the main trimmer, the set also contains an array of styling tools such as attachment combs, scissors and tapers so you can achieve the perfect look, no matter how intricate your desired style may be.

name: MOBILE SHAVER M90
product_description:
Take Braun’s MobileShave technology on the road with the Braun Mobile Shave, the convenient gadget that allows men to have smooth skin, anytime, anywhere. No longer fear your 5 o’clock shadow!
Restore a freshly groomed appearance whenever and wherever you need to look your best with the Braun Mobile Shaver. The convenient and handy shaver is compact in size and powered by 2 AA batteries making it perfect for use at work, in the car, or even on short holiday trips.
The Braun Mobile Shaver is Braun‘s smallest electric shaver, but does not compromise on superior technology, reliable quality or sleek design you expect from Braun. It’s a must have shaving tool for any man who wants or needs to look great all day long.
Braun Mobile Shaver features:

name: Light Duo+ Anti-Ageing Program Treatment Using Light
product_description:
Combat common skin concerns with the Talika Light Duo+ Anti-Ageing Program Treatment; an intelligent, anti-ageing device that delivers three different light therapy treatments in one compact design.
Inspired by aerospace research, the innovative tool utilises a unique combination of Light 590® Collagen Booster (orange) to improve elasticity and minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, Light 525® Skin Lightener (green) to diminish dark spots and pigmentation, and Light 630® Skin Soother (red) to reduce redness and inflammation.
With an ergonomic silhouette that fits perfectly in your hand, the Talika Light Duo+ features an optional ionotherapy and gentle vibration function for a more intense programme. Equipped with a timer that enables the device to start automatically upon contact with skin and stop once the treatment is finished. Powered by a rechargeable battery.

name: Holiday Pamper Yourself Essentials - (IRIS, LUNA Play) Pearl Pink (Worth £153)
product_description:
Look after number one with FOREO's Holiday Pamper Yourself Essentials. Combining a facial cleansing device with a next generation eye massager, the set will leave you feeling squeaky clean and refreshed. Complete with a cooling gel eye mask.
FOREO IRIS™:
Designed with innovative Alternating T-Sonic™ technology, the eye massager features two modes: a gentle 'Pure Mode' to replicate the feeling of a manual massage and 'Spa Mode', which combines tapping and delicate pulsations for a professional beauty treatment experience. Crafted from premium, ultra-hygienic silicone that is gentle to the delicate eye contour area, the device prevents bacteria build-up and improves the absorption of skincare products, especially serum and cream. Reduces the appearance of puffiness and dark circles, whilst smoothening crow's feet, fine lines and wrinkles for revitalised eyes. Fully waterproof and easy to clean, its compact, lightweight design makes the IRIS™ ideal for travelling, so you can refresh eyes on the move. An advanced eye-brightening device with multiple intensity levels to suit individual needs and comfort requirements.
FOREO LUNA™ play:
An ultra-portable facial-cleansing device designed to provide a professional standard of skincare for all skin types. The perfect introductory product for FOREO beginners, the travel-sized device is the smallest in the range (the same size as a cotton pad!) and offers up to 100 uses*. Combining T-Sonic™ Pulsation Technology non-porous silicone touch-points, the device gently yet effectively cleanses and exfoliates with a single intensity, dual-zone range; its thicker touch points at the top perform an intense clean to help unclog pores and lift away dirt, oil and dead skin, whilst softer, thinner points at the bottom gently cleanse sensitive or normal skin, and larger areas such as the cheeks. Flexible and easy to use, the silicone 'bristles' are ultra-hygienic and resist bacteria build-up to keep skin fresh and clean. 100% waterproof, the device is safe for use in the bath or shower. *Approximately 1-2 months when the device is used twice a day.
Gel Cooling Mask:
A cooling eye mask to help revitalise and rejuvenate tired, fatigued peepers.

name: London The Full Monty 3-in-1 Total Skincare Gift Set - Amethyst
product_description:
Transform skin from head to toe The Full Monty 3-in-1 Total Skincare Gift Set from Magnitone London. The five-piece collection boasts the coveted Full Monty! Skincare Brush in a limited edition, purple hue, alongside three additional brush heads and a convenient shower hammock. Suitable for all skin types, the gift set guarantees to provide a thorough cleanse and exfoliation, as well as a salon-worthy pedicure.
The Full Monty 3-in-1 Total Skincare Brush - Limited Edition Amethyst
Tone and exfoliate skin with The Full Monty! 3-in-1 Total Skincare Brush, an innovative brush that deeply cleanses the face and body to remove dirt, make-up and excess oil. Powered by award-winning Vibra-Sonic™ technology, the device features a soft brush head that rotates at 15,000 pulsed oscillations per minute for a pore-penetrating action, revealing a smoother, refined texture.
Suitable for all skin types, the tool stimulates blood circulation to boost natural collagen production, effectively increasing suppleness and restoring a smoother appearance. With five cleansing modes including Body Exfoliation, Pedi-Buff and three facial settings, you can customise your daily routine to firm, tighten and reignite a radiant glow from head to toe. Fully waterproof and easy to clean, its compact, lightweight design makes the Full Monty! ideal for travelling so you can achieve visibly brighter, clearer and healthier skin on the move.
Pedi-Buff Brush Head
Get feet sandal-ready with the Pedi-Buff Brush Head; a powerful roller that provides a thorough pedicure to feet in need of pampering. Boasting diamond-tough dermabrasion crystals, the brush head effectively buffs dry, hard and rough skin from feet, including stubborn heels.  Expect the roller to reveal salon-soft skin instantly and effortlessly.
Luxury Silk Bliss Brush Head
The Silk Bliss Brush Head with SkinKind™ Bristles is the perfect choice for better skin hydration and superior pore purification. Featuring a soft head with feather-fine bristles, the brush creates a rich lather with your cleanser for a luxurious deep cleansing action. Compatible with all Magnitone Cleansing Brushes with a facial cleanse mode. Replace every 3 months.
The Stimulator Brush Head
The Stimulator Brush Head is a replacement brush head featuring soft, non-porous rubber-silicone nodules for a stimulating skin workout. Ideal for massaging in and improving absorption of serum, cream and oil products, the massage head boosts micro-circulation for a healthy-looking, radiant glow. Compatible with all Magnitone Cleansing Brushes with a facial cleanse mode. This massage head does not need to be replaced.
Shower Hammock
The Shower Hamomock stores your cleansing device and provides additional space for replacement brush heads. Both hygienic and practical, its simple, compact design is the perfect accessory for your bathroom.

name: Rechargeable Personal Trimmer
product_description:
Keep unruly hairs at bay with the Wahl Rechargeable Personal Trimmer, a cordless trimmer specifically designed to tackle ear, nose and brow hairs to keep you looking perfectly preened.
Equipped with three interchangeable heads for targeted trimming, the versatile device offers 120 minutes run time, and features a reciprocating head for detail trimming around eyebrows.

name: Hair Cut and Beard Clipper
product_description:
Stay perfectly groomed with the Wahl Hair Cut and Beard Clipper, a rechargeable hair clipper that combines power with precision.

Designed to cut hair and trim your moustache and beard, the multi-tasking device comes with detachable blades for easy cleaning, and a full range of guide combs for different types of cutting, depending on your needs. The powerful tool professionally cuts hair into shape and offers precision and accuracy when trimming facial hair.

Can be used cordless or with a cord. Complete with a stubble and beard comb to keep your style preened.

The Kit Contains:
12 guide combs, barber scissors, soft pouch, styling comb, barber comb, moustache comb, cleaning brush and oil.

name: 3200 Compact - Silver
product_description:
Lightweight yet powerful, the Parlux 3200 Compact - Silver is the most widely used professional dryer on the market. With a 1900 watt, AC K-Lamination motor, the dryer boasts an airflow of 69 cubic metres per hour, allowing it to dry your hair quickly and efficiently.
Weighing in at just 490 grams and measuring just 20cm, it's easy to hold and control, whilst the 4 temperature settings and 2 speed settings make it suitable for any hair type. The dryer also comes with two styling nozzles to keep your hair big and bouncy all day. - L.M.
Please Note: Supplied with a UK 3 pin plug only.

name: Professional Styling 4x Vari-Waver
product_description:
Experience wave versatility with the 4x Vari-Waver from Diva ProfessionalStyling, a hair tool with adjustable wave depths to create different style curls, depending on your mood.
Complete with four differing wave depths and variable heat settings up to 210°C, the tool features an adjustable dial which raises and lowers a central prong to create your chosen wave, and its barrels are infused with keratin and macadamia and argan oil to create the most beautifully defined, glossy, frizz-free waves every time. Its state of the art technology offers rapid heat up and recovery, and an ultra-even heat system ensures waves are perfectly defined and consistent all day.
Perfect for creating natural-looking 'mermaid' hair, or dramatic, glamorous waves in no time at all, the styler with digital heat control is ready to use in seconds. Create long lasting, wavy locks. - K.N.

name: Professional Styling Intelligent Digital Argan Tong (25mm)
product_description:
The Feel the Heat Intelligent Digital Argan Tong (25mm) from Diva Professional is the perfect curling companion for all hair types. Give yourself medium waves or curls with the Argan Oil infused wand, for sleek and silky curls that look and feel much healthier compared to using other heated styling wands.
The Intelligent Digital Argan Tong (25mm) features:
- Instant heat up technology.- Controllable digital heat settings from 110°C to 210°C. - Argan Oil infused wand for smooth, glossy hair.- Auto power-off after an hour of no use. - Built-in heat protection stand.
The heat system within the wand ensures it is heated throughout, for perfectly balanced curls every time. - K.R

name: Sorbie Keratin + Argan 2000W Diffuser Dryer
product_description:
Create the perfect blow dry in an instant with the Trevor Sorbie Keratin + Argan 2000W Diffuser Dryer. Compact and lightweight, it features three heat settings, two speed settings and a cold shot button to set your style in place, whilst the keratin and argan grill leaves your locks with a smooth and shiny finish.
Complete with a removable filter for easy cleaning and a hanging loop for storage, the high-performance dryer also comes with a three meter cord, a concentrator nozzle and a diffuser. - L.M.

Features:

name: PRO Titanium Expression Curling Tong (38mm)
product_description:
Made to give you voluptuous waves with a lasting finish, the Titanium Expression 38mm Curling Tong by BaByliss Pro boast classic style and quality design. Heating up to 210°C with 11 temperature settings for ultimate control, this curling tong is a must have hair styling tool.
The 11 digital temperature settings give you ultimate control and boasts a range up to 210°C with a 15 second heat up. The 38mm barrel gives loose waves, whilst the 2.7 swivel cord boasts salon length. Complete with a heat mat with storage compartment. K.D.
Features:

name: Powerlight 385 - Pink
product_description:
Featuring a built in silencer, the pink Parlux Powerlight 385 includes the same eco-friendly technology that the Parlux hairdryers are known for whilst being smaller and quieter than others in the range. Powerful, lightweight and boasting ceramic and ionic technology, this model doesn’t give out any harmful emissions and maintains hair’s moisture despite the use of heat. It also boasts a three metre cable, airflow of 79 cubic metres per hour and a carefully crafted handle which has been ergonomically designed for the perfect balance when styling. - E.D
Please Note: Supplied with a UK 3 pin plug only.

name: For Men Mini Trimmer - Blue
product_description:
Take professional action with the BaByliss For Men Mini Trimmer, a cordless hair trimmer with two interchangeable cutting heads; perfect for removing excess hair from sideburns, eyebrows, and the nose and ears.
Safe and easy to use, at home or on the go, the trimmer features a five position comb with a variety of cutting lengths, from 2mm to 10mm, to tidy uneven patches and create well-pruned, well-groomed styles. - K.N.

name: Fabulips Pout-O-Matic
product_description:
With a massaging nub that softly buffs away flakiness and dryness, the Bliss Fabulips Pout-O-Matic is a pro-powered, lip perfecting device which boasts a custom designed head and uses gentle rotation to effectively stimulate and exfoliate your lips. 
A must-have beauty tool for full and soft lips, the Pout-O-Matic is guaranteed to supercharge your lip care routine and leave them looking and feeling good enough to kiss. - E.D

name: PRO Ionic Airstyler (34mm)
product_description:
Designed to give your hair voluptuous style, the BaByliss Pro Ionic Airstyler boasts unique features to give a salon perfect, frizz free finish every time. With a powerful 800W motor, a ceramic coated barrel and salon length cord, the Airstyler can create shapes and curls in your locks which last all day and night.

The 3 speed settings allow you to gage that perfect temperature to achieve a sleek style, whilst this 34mm barrel has been created specifically for mid to short styles. K.D.

name: Chromatix - Rubberised Black
product_description:
The black Dynamica3400 Pro Chromatix dryer from Diva Professional is the perfect drying companion for all hair types. Give yourself super smooth, glossy dry locks in no time with the quick-powered 2100 watt hairdryer. Blow dry and style your hair as desired, following with the cool shot button to set hair into shape.
The Dynamica3400 Pro Chromatix features:
- Cool shot button. - 4 heat and 2 speed settings to choose from. - 2100W power. - 3 metre long flexible cable.
The lightweight styling tool makes drying your hair quick and easy, without being left with the achy arm feeling afterwards. - K.R

name: PRO Titanium Expression Curling Tong (32mm)
product_description:
Made to give you bouncy, voluptuous curls with a lasting finish, the Titanium Expression 32mm Curling Tong by BaByliss Pro boast classic style and quality design. Heating up to 210°C with 11 temperature settings for ultimate control, this curling tong is a must have hair styling tool.
The 11 digital temperature settings give you ultimate control and boasts a range up to 210°C with a 15 second heat up. The 32mm barrel gives soft curls and waves, whilst the 2.7 swivel cord boasts salon length. Complete with a heat mat with storage compartment. K.D.

name: ISSA™ Cool Black Hybrid Replacement Brush Head
product_description:
The ISSA™ Hybrid Replacement Brush Head from FOREO has been developed for powerful and effective cleaning, whilst remaining gentle to teeth and gums. Durable and flexible, the unique brush head features premium-grade silicone outer bristles to reach the gums and inner PBT polymer inner bristles that vigorously remove plaque build-up. Soft and non-abrasive for the ultimate brushing experience. E.N.
Size: H:80 x W:15mm
Weight: 9.8g
User Time: Up to 6 months
Please Note: This replacement head is compatible with the FOREO ISSA™ toothbrush device.

name: Vitality White & Clean Rechargable Toothbrush
product_description: Oral-B Vitality White & Clean rechargable toothbrush removes more plaque than an ordinary manual toothbrush and polishes away surface stains. Features a head with a unique polishing cup to surround each tooth and polish away surface stains, while removing more plaque than an ordinary manual brush.

name: Professional Styling Feel the Heat Elite Intelligent Digital Styler - Coral
product_description:
Infused with snag-free Argan Oil, the Diva Feel The Heat Elite Coral  Styler will leave you hair looking luxuriously smooth and  glossy. The  coated, floating plates protect hair and boast high  performance with an  impressive heat up time of only 20 seconds.
Suitable for any hair type, the heat setting can be adjusted from 110°C to 230°C, allowing you to create the styles you want, whether it  be curls, waves or super straight, sleek hair. The stylers help to eliminate frizz and flyaways to give you ultimate control when styling your hair. -SA

name: Professional Styling Veloce 3800 PRO Rubberised Red
product_description:
Compact yet powerful, the Diva Professional Styling Veloce3800 PRO Rubberised Red is a durable dryer that is sure to stand the test of time. Manufactured with a professional grade AC motor, it produces an airflow of 106 cubic metres per hour and 2000W of power, whilst providing heat of up to 105°C.
With two speed settings and four heat settings to suit all hair types, the dryer also boasts an ionic conditioning generator, as well as ceramic and tourmaline grills which speed up drying time and leave your hair with a smooth, static-free look. Finished with a rubberised matte exterior, the dryer also comes with a flexible 3 metre cord and two sleek nylon concentrators for both speed drying and styling, as well as a cold shot button to set your style in place. - L.M.Features:

name: Straight & Style Speed Brush - Purple
product_description:
Say goodbye to bad hair days with the Straight & Style Speed Brush from Glamoriser, a multi-tasking styling tool that combines the results of a straightener with the simplicity of a hair brush. Featuring super-fast heat up time and unique Triple-Action Hot + Cool Bristle Technology, it works to detangle and straighten in a matter of seconds, whilst the heated bristles are infused with Black Diamond Oil to combat frizz and boost shine and luminescence.
Every brush stroke effortlessly tames unruly flyaways and leaves hair looking salon-sleek and feeling touchably soft; you can even wrap hair around the barrel to create soft waves, flicks and curls. Five variable settings enable heat adjustment from 120°C to 210°C, allowing customisable styling to suit individual hair types. Achieve glossy, professional-looking results without the hassle.

name: Wet N Dry Nasal Trimmer - Satin
product_description:
Remove unwanted hair with the Wahl Wet N Dry Nasal Trimmer - Satin. As well being great for nose hair, this handy trimmer will also get rid of ear and eyebrow hair, so you can keep your appearance wonderfully groomed.
The rotary blade rinses clean after every use, meaning your timmer always stays hygienic and free from bacteria. There's also a protective cap which helps to keep the blade out of harm's way.

name: Professional Styling Rebel Feel The Heat Elite Lily Daze
product_description:
Create an array of styles with the Lily Daze Diva Professional Styling Rebel Feel The Heat Elite; a high-performance straightener arriving in a grey hue with a feminine floral print.
Effortlessly gliding through locks, the hair straighteners are crafted with floating Ceramic plates from Korea. The Argan infused plates are able to condition the hair whilst delivering evenly distributed heat. Allowing you to tailor your styling experience to your hair type, the styler arrives with variable heat controls, which range from 120°C to 220°C.
With the possibility of creating multiple styles, including straight hair, tight curls and loose waves, the straighteners guarantee to leave hair ultra-soft and enviably shiny.

name: PRO Ceramic Dial-a-Heat Tong (38mm)
product_description:
The unique ceramic barrel built into the BaByliss Pro Ceramic Dial-A-Heat Tongs heats up quickly to give a smooth, shiny finish. Distributing heat evenly to produce natural curls, this 38mm styler produces loose, gorgeous waves.
Featuring 25 temperature settings for total styling control, the BaByliss Pro Ceramic Dial-A-Heat Tongs have a heat-ready indicator system, to let you know just as soon as they’re ready rock! With a cool tip and integrated safety stand, these super-safe, super-stylish tongs will have you turning heads!

name: Trim It and Bare It
product_description:
The Bliss Trim It and Bare It is a multi-tasking trimmer that will cater for all your personal grooming needs. Featuring four function-specific attachments, it's safe for both wet and dry use.
Cordless and rechargeable, the timmer is easy to use and clean, so you can achieve salon-quality grooming in the comfort of your own home.

name: PRO Gt Ionic Dryer (2000W)
product_description:
Compact and powerful, the BaByliss Pro GT Ionic 2000w Hairdryer combines Ionic and Ceramic technologies to give the most sought after results for shiny, silky and manageable hair.
This comprehensive BaByliss Pro GT Ionic 2000w Hairdryer includes 6 heat/speed settings and 2000 watt power so you can adjust the temperature and force to your desire. With the added cold shot you can blast your hair at the end with cold air to lock in shine and leave strands softened and smoothed. The salon length cord and hanging loop make this dryer really easy to use and practical
As with all BaByliss products it has been designed by hairdressers for hairdressers and includes a long life AC motor, so you know it has been built to last!

name: Professional Styling Intelligent Digital Argan Tong (45mm)
product_description:
The Feel the Heat Intelligent Digital Argan Tong (45mm) from Diva Professional is the perfect curling companion for all hair types. Give yourself largest waves or curls with the Argan Oil infused wand, for sleek and silky curls that look and feel much healthier compared to using other heated styling wands.
The Intelligent Digital Argan Tong (45mm) features:
- Instant heat up technology.- Controllable digital heat settings from 110°C to 210°C. - Argan Oil infused wand for smooth, glossy hair.- Auto power-off after an hour of no use. - Built-in heat protection stand.
The heat system within the wand ensures it is heated throughout, for perfectly balanced curls every time. - K.R

name: Professional Styling Intelligent Digital Styler - Serenity
product_description:
Style hair like a professional with the Intelligent Digital Styler from Diva Professional Styling. The straighteners are expertly created with Argan Oil infused ceramic plates, which work to lock in hair that is sleek and shiny.
Reaching heat settings that range from 110° to 235°C in just 10-30 seconds, the straighteners can be used almost instantly and are suitable for all hair types and textures. The intelligent styler comprises an ergonomic design, allowing you to style locks with comfort and ease, whether that be creating luxurious curls or poker straight tresses. Creating styles with staying power, the straight iron features dual voltage, allowing you optimum styling wherever you may be.

name: PRO Titanium Expression Ultimate Styler
product_description:
The ultimate hair straightener, the BaByliss Pro Titanium Expression Ultimate Styler boasts innovative technology and amazing features to give you salon perfect style. With rose gold tone titanium plates for a high shine finish and advanced ceramic heaters which heat up in just 15 seconds, the styler has 12 versatile temperature settings which range from 180°C-235°C.
The extra long 3m swivel cord ensures ease of use whilst the included heat mat gives you safe storage when styling. Also featuring a unique Titanium Ceratherm™ System to instantly transfer heat to the hair to give sleek results, the plates have a curved design so it's easy to create flicks, waves and curls too.
Auto shut-off mode gives you piece of mind and the multi-voltage design is suitable for worldwide use, meaning that you can take this Titanium Expression Ultimate Styler wherever and enjoy picture perfect style on the go! K.D.

name: Melody Silencer
product_description:
The Parlux Melody Silencer is the latest Parlux accessory which significantly reduces the noise of the hairdryer – perfect for use in professional salons or even at home! This elegant accessory can be attached to all existing Parlux hairdryers*.
Reducing unwanted noise and highly shock resistant, this Parlux Melody Silencer weighs in at a tiny 52g, so won’t add weight to your dryer. Attaching quickly and easily over the rear filter, get ready to enjoy a hair styling experience like no other!
*Please note: the Parlux Melody Silencer cannot be attached to the Parlux Twin Turbo 2600 and the Hair Tools 2000.

name: Professional Styling Genesis Digital Straightener
product_description:
The Genesis Digital Styler from Diva Professional is the perfect smoothing and straightening companion for all hair types. Give yourself super smooth locks or glossy curls with the Argan, Macadamia Oil and Keratin infused plates, for sleek and silky hair that looks and feels much healthier compared to using other heated styling tools.
The Genesis Digital Straightener features:
- Instant heat up technology. - Controllable digital heat settings from 110°C to 230°C. - Argan Oil, macadamia oil and keratin infused plates for smooth, glossy hair.- Auto power-off after an hour of no use.
The heat system within the straightener ensures it is heated throughout, for perfectly all over. - K.R

name: Connect Abs Belt
product_description:
Reach your personal workout and physique goals with the Slendertone Connect Abs Belt, a revolutionary, app-driven ab sculpting belt that actively tones your abdominal muscles whilst tracking your progress using a mobile app*.
Highly ergonomic and discreet under clothes, the unisex belt can be worn around the house, at work, or during activities for enhanced results. It connects to the specially designed app via Bluetooth Smart technology, and allows you to create a profile, set your goals and monitor your progress in real time, day by day. Offering programmes tailored to your specific goals and needs, it has five 6 week programmes to help increase your physical performance, improve your shape or tone your muscles even more. Designed to be used anywhere, by anyone, wearing the belt for just 30 minutes is equivalent to performing 202 sit ups. 
Expect toned abs and a sense of achievement when you track and smash your daily goals via the app.
*This app requires and Apple iPhone 4S or newer, Apple iPad 4th generation or newer, Apple iPod Touch, or Android 4.4 or newer.

name: ISSA™ mikro Toothbrush - Sunflower Yellow
product_description:
Catering specifically for babies aged 0-4 years, FOREO's ISSA™ mikro Toothbrush allows a safe, fun and healthy brushing routine and promotes stronger, healthier gums.
Combining non-abrasive, super-soft silicone bristles with Sonic Pulse Technology, the innovative, colourful device features two modes: a 'Brush' setting to cleanse delicate teeth and gums, and a 'Massage' option that relieves tenderness and teething pain with its gentle vibrations.
Lightweight and ergonomic for a non-slip, comfortable grip, the electric toothbrush has been crafted from bacteria-resistant, food-grade silicone for ultimate hygiene, whilst its encased one-piece design has no detachable parts or sharp edges for superior safety.
An integrated timer indicates when it is time to move to a different section of the mouth, and rewarding Smile Helpers ('Glee' and 'Glum') light up to track brushing time; encouraging even the youngest users to develop good dental care habits. Waterproof and dishwasher-safe for easy cleaning.

name: LUNA™ go for Men
product_description:
FOREO LUNA™ Go for Men is the perfect travel partner for busy lifestyles. Providing a professional standard of skincare with its invigorating one-minute ritual, the compact facial cleansing device allows you to enjoy a full skincare routine no matter where you are.
Designed with T-Sonic™ technology and silicone touch-points that channel 8,000 transdermal sonic pulsations across the skin’s surface, the portable tool diminishes 99.5% of dirt and oil to leave skin smooth, healthy and refined. Flexible and easy to use, the silicone 'bristles' are ultra-hygienic and resist bacteria build-up to keep skin fresh and clean.
Its innovative Anti-Ageing Mode targets wrinkle-prone areas, whilst the Cleansing Mode promotes a close, smooth shave and minimises razor burn and irritation. 100% waterproof, the device can be used in the bath or shower, and comes complete with a travel pouch for convenient storage.
