name: Advance Light Ceramic Ionic Hair Dryer - White
product_description:
Achieve salon-worthy results with the Advance Light Ceramic Ionic Hair Dryer - White from Parlux. Delivering superior performance, the Advance hair dryer aims to meet hairdressing standards to allow for a professional blow dry.
The hair dryer is host to Parlux’s innovative 2200 Watt ‘K-ADVANCE’ motor, which is powerful and durable; shortening the time it takes to dry hair, whilst extending the lifespan of the dryer.
Exceptionally lightweight, the hairdryer was crafted with the user in mind. The styling tool boasts a built-in silencer, ‘soft touch’ switches and anti-heat casing to ensure a more comfortable hold and drying experience overall. Utilising ionic ceramic technology, the dryer guarantees to leave hair healthy, shiny and static-free.

name: Trinity and Trinity Wrinkle Reducer Gift Set
product_description:
Rediscover a younger, firmer-looking complexion with the NuFACE Trinity and Trinity Wrinkle Reducer Gift Set. Combining a facial toning device with a wrinkle-banishing attachment, the duo will contribute to a smoother, lifted and younger-looking complexion with regular use.
Trinity Facial Toning Device:
An award-winning microcurrent treatment packed into an innovatively-designed device with interchangeable treatment attachments. Designed to combat visible signs of ageing, the facial toning device works to stimulate both the large surface areas and small contours of the face, creating similar results to a face lift, however the treatment is pain free and can take only 5 minutes. Mircrocurrent devices mimic the natural current of the body, which slows as we age. Going deeper than the surface, the toning device visibly tones the facial muscles, improving the contour, evening the appearance of skin tone and visibly reducing fine lines and wrinkles. Safe and effective for all skin types, it will leave the complexion looking youthful and visibly supple.
Trinity Wrinkle Attachment:
An FDA-cleared attachment that works to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles around the eyes, mouth and forehead. Compatible with your Trinity Facial Toning Device, the attachment is designed with an ergonomic shape to perfectly fit the contours of your face, and utilises photo light therapy to address wrinkles; it delivers a targeted combination of red, amber and infrared lights to help improve the appearance of skin. Its smart skin sensor enables lights when properly positioned on the face, and its three minute indicator and 21 minute auto-shut off make it easy to use. Regular and continued use is recommended for best results.
Gel Primer (59ml)
Prepare for the NuFACE Trinity device with the Gel Primer. The lightweight formula allows for the device to glide across the skin easily, whilst ensuring maximum microcurrent conductivity for optimum results. Suitable for all skin types, the formula is water-based and extremely easy to remove.

name: Triple Head Personal Battery Trimmer
product_description:
Remove unwanted hair with the Wahl Triple Head Personal Battery Trimmer. As well being great for nose hair, this handy trimmer will also get rid of ear and eyebrow hair, so you can keep your appearance wonderfully groomed.
The reciprocating and rotary blades rinse clean after every use, meaning your timmer always stays hygienic and free from bacteria.

name: Hair Removal Laser 4X - Graphite
product_description:
Achieve soft, smooth skin with Tria Hair Removal Laser 4X, a clinically-proven, cordless hair removal device that works to reduce up to 70% of unwanted hair after just 2 treatments in as few as 3 months.
Dermatologist recommended, the innovative device safely and effectively removes hair with FDA-cleared laser technology; it utilises the same diode laser technology preferred by dermatologists to target and permanently disable the hair follicle for permanent results*, and has 3 times more hair eliminating energy than any other at home device.
Suitable for most hair and skin tones, the professional device is fast, powerful and easy to use; its interactive LED display guides you through each treatment for optimum results, and its longer battery life makes it ideal for covering multiple face and body parts during each treatment.
Expect soft, smooth skin with long term results.
After 2-3 months of treatment, hair growth will appear lighter and finer. After 3 months of treatment, hair follicles that have been deactivated will no longer grow hair. Continue to use as necessary for touch-ups.
Product Features:
Safe and easy hair removal.
Permanent results.
Clinically-proven.
FDA-cleared laser technology.
Cordless.
LED display.
30 minute battery life.
Easy grip handle.

name: Professional Styling Radiant Shine Ionic Thermal Heated Brush (40mm)
product_description:
Perfect for creating gorgeous curls and waves, Diva Professional  Styling Radiant Shine Ionic Thermal Heated Brush has a Macadamia Oil,  Argan Oil and Keratin infused barrel that provides an ultra-shiny,  smooth and professional finish.
To create fuller body to curls or waves, you can use the styling  brush with a hair dryer for faster and more effective styling. -SA

name: Boutique Hair Dryer - Black
product_description:
Achieve the perfect blow dry with the Boutique Hair Dryer from BaByliss, a brand that combines high fashion styling with outstanding quality. The dryer has a sleek and compact design along with a hanging loop for neat storage. Designed with Tourmaline-Ceramic Technology™ to dry hair molecules inside out, minimising heat damage and a high performance 2400W motor to make blow drying quicker.
Featuring an active iconic conditioning system to control static and frizzy hair, the dryer works by neutralising positive ions which build up in the hair and leave it looking dull and limp. Hair will be smooth and manageable thanks to the ultra slim concentrator nozzle which allows precise styling for flawless results. The numerous heat and speed settings can be altered and the cold shot button can be used to create your desired hair style with a professional, salon-style finish. E.N.

name: Powerpik Hairdryer
product_description:
The Wahl Powerpik Hairdryer is specially designed to dry afro hair quickly and efficiently, thanks to the unique pik attachment which provides deep and effective drying and the powerful turbo motor.
With three speed and temperature settings to choose from, the lightweight design is easy to control, clean and store.
Please Note: Supplied with a UK 3 pin plug only.

name: Deluxe Rechargeable Grooming Station
product_description:
Ideal for trimming and styling beards and goatees as well as all-over body use, the Wahl Deluxe Rechargeable Grooming Station features four interchangeable cutting heads which allow you to achieve intricate and precise results.
On a full charge, the trimmer will give you 60 minutes of cordless use, so you don't need to worry about annoying cables.

name: Hot Brush - Black
product_description:
Achieve sleek, smooth and shiny hair with the Corioliss Hot Brush. Delivering enviable results, the styling tool combs through hair, detangling locks and straightening the fibers. The massaging heat protection bristles are able to tackle larger sections of hair and are ideal for applying oil treatments to locks, allowing you to achieve a gorgeous look quickly and easily.
Swiftly reaching a maximum temperature of 230°C and boasting worldwide dual-voltage circuitry, the hot brush is perfect for on-the-go, delivering effective results even whilst on holiday. Expect radiant and shiny hair that is manageable.

name: 3500 Super Compact Hair Dryer - Black
product_description:
The perfect compact hair dryer, the Parlux 3500 Super Compact Hair Dryer is light, balanced, quiet and just 17cm in size. With its ergonomic shape it’s an ideal tool for the most demanding stylist or home user looking for simply the best.
The Parlux 3500 Super Compact Hair Dryer will exceed your expectations and deliver power you did not think possible from a compact. To meet the needs of today’s professional stylists and discerning home users, Parlux has created the 3500 to provide greater durability, higher power, lighter weight and smaller dimensions. Never before have all these goals been achieved in a single appliance – the Parlux 3500 Super Compact Hair Dryer!
All Parlux professional dryers are fitted as standard with three metre hairdryer cables, and feature a carefully crafted handle which has been designed for perfect balance, easy use and greater control of the dryer. Legendary Parlux reliability comes as standard.
Please Note: Supplied with a UK 3 pin plug only.

name: LUNA™ go for Oily Skin
product_description:
Treat and transform skin with the FOREO LUNA™ go, a compact, travel-friendly facial-cleansing device designed to provide a professional standard of skincare with its invigorating one-minute ritual. Specially tailored to treat oily skin, the facial brush inspires a healthier-looking complexion; helping to gently clear and clarify for a luminous glow.
Combining T-Sonic™ Pulsation Technology with soft, specially customised silicone touch-points, the device gently yet effectively cleanses and exfoliates with a single intensity; its soft, non-porous touch points perform an intense cleanse on skin, lifting away dirt, oil and makeup residue for a fresher complexion. Flexible and easy to use, the silicone 'bristles' are ultra-hygienic and resist bacteria build-up to keep skin fresh and clean.
Embedded with a high-technology Anti-Ageing Mode, the cleanser directs lower-frequency pulsations to wrinkle-prone areas to help smooth and firm the appearance of skin. 100% waterproof, the device is safe for use in the bath or shower. Complete with a travel pouch to keep it clean and ready to use.
Hypoallergenic. free from phthalates and BPA.
Product Features:
Up to 30 uses per each full charge.
1 pulsation intensity.
Ultra-hygienic.
Fully waterproof for use in shower.
Targeted for specific skin type.
No replacement brushes required.
2-Year Limited Warranty and 10-Year Quality Guarantee.

name: 3200 Flowers Hair Dryer - Black/Silver
product_description:
The limited edition Parlux 3200 Flowers Hair Dryer is the most en-trend hair tool this season. With a sleek black finish and silver flower print design, it’s the most powerful, eye catching hairdryer on the professional market.
Lighter, more durable and more powerful, the Parlux 3200 Flowers Hair Dryer is perfect for at home and salon use. The professional AC motor affords an airflow of 69 cubic metres/hour, which makes the Parlux 3200 compact one of the most powerful, professional hairdryers in the world. Not only does the Parlux 3200 have incredible power, but it weighs in at only 490 grams and measures a tiny 20cm, which helps in reducing operating fatigue - a common problem with heavier hairdryers.
All Parlux professional dryers are fitted as standard with three metre hairdryer cables, and feature a carefully crafted handle which has been designed for perfect balance, easy use and greater control of the dryer. Legendary Parlux reliability comes as standard.
Please Note: Supplied with a UK 3 pin plug only.

name: Perfect Reach Handheld Massager
product_description:
Portable and handheld, HoMedics present the Perfect Reach Handheld Massager. Complete with three massage attachments, including: a wide area for larger muscles, a roller for kneading and massaging and a spot setting for targeted relief, the massager will effectively alleviate muscle discomfort. Comfortable to hold with its lightweight, ergonomic design, the massager can offer you a low and relaxing massage or highly stimulating one dependent on your needs. Requires: 2 x AAA batteries (included). Storage bag included. - K.N.
Product dimensions: 9.5 x 28.4 x 8.43cm

name: Fat Girl Lean Machine
product_description: Now, you can take ‘charge’ of your slimming routine at home with the fatgirlslim lean machine body contouring system. Inspired by our professional treatment, this spa-it-yourself system pairs the first power tool in the ‘Fatgirl’ family—a vacuum massager that uses a powerful combination oflifting, suction, rolling and pulsing lotions—with our famed caffeine-boosted fatgirlslim firming cream to smooth and tone the skin, giving the legs,buttocks and abs a more contoured look. Along with a healthy diet and regular exercise, this body bettering duo is a seriously ‘thigh’-tech way tohelp you achieve a sleeker-looking silhouette.Vacuuming has never been more fun!Directions:Step 1: stimulate: In the shower, apply our body-toning, skin-smoothing fatgirlscrub.Step 2: prep: always apply fatgirlslim® to thighs, buttocks, hips and stomach prior to using the lean machine to ensure proper glideStep 3: smooth + firm: take ‘charge’ with the fatgirlslim lean machine body contouring system, which delivers effective vacuumassistedmassage action and helps visibly reduce the appearance of celluliteStep 4: tone: target abs with fatgirlsixpack by massaging the tool into the tummy in a circular motionStep 5: smooth + snooze: Repeat that rubdown before bed with our ultra-rich overnight cream, fatgirlsleep

name: Body Waver Styling Wand
product_description:
Create salon-worthy waves with the T3 Body Waver Styling Wand. The hair styling tool helps you to create smooth, shiny and frizz-free styles no matter the length or texture of your hair.

  Featuring SinglePass Radial Technology, the bodywaver uses a ring of ceramic heaters along the outside of the barrel to deliver consistent heat for ultimate effectiveness. -SA

name: PRO Titanium Expression Curling Tong (25mm)
product_description:
Made to give you bouncy, voluptuous curls with a lasting finish, the Titanium Expression 25mm Curling Tong by BaByliss Pro boast classic style and quality design. Heating up to 210°C with 11 temperature settings for ultimate control, this curling tong is a must have hair styling tool.
The 11 digital temperature settings give you ultimate control and boasts a range up to 210°C with a 15 second heat up. The 25mm barrel gives super tight curls, whilst the 2.7 swivel cord boasts salon length. Complete with a heat mat with storage compartment. K.D.

name: For Men 6 in 1 Titanium Grooming Kit - Blue
product_description:
Take professional action with the BaByliss For Men 6-in-1 Titanium Grooming Kit, an advanced hair trimmer with two interchangeable cutting heads for grooming facial, hygienic and body hair.
Featuring titanium blade technology for precision trimming, and a 6-position comb guide that offers a variety of three shorter lengths, and three longer lengths, the 6-in-1 gadget will leave you feeling in control and stubble free. Complete with storage stand for trimmer and its four attachment combs. - K.N.
Top Tips: Before using for the first time, appliance should be charged continuously for 15 hours. This initial super-charge ensures optimum power performance to ensure smooth, fast trimming every time. Full charge will provide 30 minutes of use.

name: Groomsman Rechargeable Trimmer
product_description:
Perfect for complete grooming, the Wahl Groomsman Rechargeable Trimmer allows you to look your best at all times. Ideal for removing unwanted facial and body hair, it features high-carbon steel blades which stay sharper for longer, whilst the soft touch grip gives you ultimate control.
Powerful yet quiet, the trimmer will give a full hour of cordless operation when fully charged. The kit also includes a range of position combs and trim attachments, allowing you to achieve your desired look.

name: Pocket Go Shaver M60b
product_description:
The Braun Pocket Go Shaver is your perfect grooming friend outside home giving you smooth skin, anytime, anywhere. Thanks to its compact size and powered by 2 AA batteries it can easily be used at work, in the car, or even on short holiday trips.
The Smart Foil™ captures hairs growing in different directions.
Extra wide and thin ultra flexing foil for an extra close and comfortable shave.
The MobileShave is fully washable under running water.
Protects the foil when not in use, but also acts as a handle extension for a comfortable grip.

name: C1 Carbon Fiber Hairstraightener - White
product_description:
Boasting a slim line design and professional 3m salon approved swivel cord to enable you to curl, straighten, smooth or wave hair with ease, the white Corioliss C1 Carbon Fiber Hairstraightener is perfect for achieving super glamorous and perfectly styled hair.
With professional titanium smooth plate technology and extra long floating plates, along with LED digital temperature control and safety sleep mode which shuts the styler down after 30 minutes, these ergonomically designed irons also have negative ion technology eliminates static resulting in hair that is soft, silky and shiny. - E.D

name: ISSA™ Mint Hybrid Replacement Brush Head
product_description:
The ISSA™ Hybrid Replacement Brush Head from FOREO has been developed for powerful and effective cleaning, whilst remaining gentle to teeth and gums. Durable and flexible, the unique brush head features premium-grade silicone outer bristles to reach the gums and inner PBT polymer inner bristles that vigorously remove plaque build-up. Soft and non-abrasive for the ultimate brushing experience. E.N.
Size: H:80 x W:15mm
Weight: 9.8g
User Time: Up to 6 months
Please Note: This replacement head is compatible with the FOREO ISSA™ toothbrush device.

name: London BareFaced Vibra-Sonic™ Daily Cleansing Brush - Pastel Orange
product_description: Firm and tighten your complexion with the Magnitone BareFaced Vibra-Sonic™ Daily Cleansing Brush, a powerful tool that delivers a deep pore-cleansing action for radiant, refined skin. Effectively exfoliates the skin's surface to eliminate excess oil, dead skin cells, dirt and impurities, whilst improving the absorption of moisturising and skincare products to take the 'dare' out of going bare. The soft brush is gentle to skin and the innovative, double award-winning Vibra-Sonic™ technology combines energising sonic oscillations and electromagnetic pulsed vibrations to boost micro-circulation and tone skin for a plump appearance and healthy-looking glow. With a completely waterproof design, the brush features an on/off button, wireless USB charger and Pulselift™ Toning Mode for a feathery-soft, sixty second skin workout.

name: Sorbie Keratin and Argan Wand (32-19mm)
product_description:
Produce gorgeously glossy drop curls with the Trevor Sorbie Keratin and Argan Wand. The 32-96mm barrel is coated with keratin and argan oil, to keep hair more protected, shiny and healthier compared to other heated styling tools.
The Trevor Sorbie Keratin and Argan Wand (32-96mm) features:
The adjustable heat settings allow you to experiement and change your style each time; the higher the temperature the tighter the curl achieved.- K.R

name: Pigment Control Anti-Dark Spots Cosmetic Instrument
product_description:
Brighten and even the appearance of your skin with Talika Pigment Control Anti-Dark Spots Cosmetic Instrument, an anti-ageing light therapy device that targets dark spots on the face, hands and décolleté to promote younger-looking skin with proven results.
Inspired by aerospace research, the patented device combines the emission of Green Light (525 nm) Wavelength with an Ionotherapy Function; the green light targets and regulates melanocyte activity whilst imperceptible ionic micro-currents stimulate skin to enhance the efficacy and penetration of traditional brightening creams. Delivering ultra-targeted action, the ergonomic tool helps to visibly reduce the size and intensity of dark spots and discolouration for brighter, more even toned skin.
Easy-to-use and automatically switches off after one minute.

name: ISSA™ mikro Toothbrush - Pearl Pink
product_description:
Catering specifically for babies aged 0-4 years, FOREO's ISSA™ mikro Toothbrush allows a safe, fun and healthy brushing routine and promotes stronger, healthier gums.
Combining non-abrasive, super-soft silicone bristles with Sonic Pulse Technology, the innovative, colourful device features two modes: a 'Brush' setting to cleanse delicate teeth and gums, and a 'Massage' option that relieves tenderness and teething pain with its gentle vibrations.
Lightweight and ergonomic for a non-slip, comfortable grip, the electric toothbrush has been crafted from bacteria-resistant, food-grade silicone for ultimate hygiene, whilst its encased one-piece design has no detachable parts or sharp edges for superior safety.
An integrated timer indicates when it is time to move to a different section of the mouth, and rewarding Smile Helpers ('Glee' and 'Glum') light up to track brushing time; encouraging even the youngest users to develop good dental care habits. Waterproof and dishwasher-safe for easy cleaning.

name: Twirl Convertible Curling Iron
product_description:
Create covetable curls with the T3 Twirl Convertible Curling Iron; a versatile hair styling tool that helps you achieve salon-worthy locks with a healthy-looking glossy sheen.
The innovative styler features T3 SinglePass™ technology, able to control any heat fluctuations for an even and consistent temperature level across the entire barrel, enabling quicker and healthier styling.
The Tourmaline and Ceramic coated barrel seals individual cuticles for frizz-free, natural-looking results, with an interchangeable design allowing you to create endless looks with variable shaped T3 barrels (sold separately). Achieve long-lasting waves and curls with minimum damage and maximum staying power.

name: Nine Micro Iron
product_description:
For the very first time, all the technology of a large format straightener has been delivered in micro size. Proving to be a massive hit with both the travel and male grooming media, the Cloud Nine Micro Iron isn’t just a cute addition to the family, it’s a little workhorse.
Measuring only 6 inches in length, the Cloud Nine Micro Iron is perfect for any suitcase, making it the ideal travel size companion. Lightweight, with cushioned plates, this micro straightener not only allows you to focus on shorter areas of hair like the fringe, it's also ideal for shorter styles overall. With a heat guard and hibernation mode, as well as the same incredible black ceramic plates as the other Cloud Nine irons, it's a must for anyone wanting to look their best, no matter where they are in the world.
The unique features of the Cloud Nine Micro Iron include:
Please Note: The Cloud Nine Micro Iron does not come with temperature control.

name: For Men Super Crew Cut Clipper - Red/Black
product_description:
Be your own barber with the BaByliss For Men Super Crew Cut Clipper, a revolutionary hair clipper designed to precisely trim and cut your hair at home from grades 1-4.
Powered with an enhanced lithium ion system, the clipper's precision hardened, Japanese rotary steel blades offer a super sharp cutting angle for smooth, easy cutting every time, leaving you with an all over, even length. Adjust the cutting grade with the interchangeable comb guide to tidy up unruly sideburns and overgrown necklines. - K.N.
WARNINGS: The clipper is for use only on the head. Never use the Clipper on the face or any other area of the body.
You must take your time to charge the unit for 3 hours before its first use. Even if you want to use it plugged in straight from the mains, this initial 'super-charge' ensures optimum power performance to give smooth fast cutting every time.

name: Head Jog Gold Titanium Pencil Wand
product_description:
Achieve tight, natural-looking curls with the Electric Head Jog Gold Titanium Pencil Wand, a gold-titanium coated curling wand that creates ringlet-style coils.
Easy-to-use with its wrap and style function, the curling tongs offer variable temperature settings from 120°C to 230°C, and have high ionic output that ensures heat is directed inside the hair, preserving hair's natural moisture and protecting the external structure from drying out. The slim barrel allows you to create tight curls, and its efficient heat conduction evenly distributes heat through the barrel for consistent results. Hair looks healthy and shiny. Complete with a cool tip and thermal heat glove for safe styling.

name: 3200 Compact - White Flower Edition
product_description:
Lightweight yet powerful, the Parlux 3200 Compact - White Flower Edition is the  most widely used professional dryer on the market. With a 1900 watt, AC  K-Lamination motor, the dryer boasts an airflow of 69 cubic metres per  hour, allowing it to dry your hair quickly and efficiently.
Weighing in at just 490 grams and measuring just 20cm, it's easy to  hold and control, whilst the 4 temperature settings and 2 speed settings  make it suitable for any hair type. The dryer also comes with two  styling nozzles to keep your hair big and bouncy all day. - L.M.
Please Note: Supplied with a UK 3 pin plug only.

name: Premium Hair System Ultra Dryer - Black
product_description:
Achieve salon-style results with the Glamoriser Premium Hair System Ultra Dryer, a powerful yet lightweight hair dryer that utilises innovative Ion-Flex Technology to produce glossy, static-free locks. Powered by a 2200W motor, the dryer features customisable ion settings, allowing you to switch between positive and negative ions depending on whether you want maximum volume or poker-straight sleek styles.
With a Micro-Motor system, it offers reduced noise, extra long-life performance and an intensive airflow with variable temperature settings to suit specific hair types, including a cool shot to set your style into place. Ceramic coating and the ionic conditioning process lock in moisture to reduce frizz and enhance hairs natural shine whilst protecting from heat damage. Expect fast results and healthier-looking tresses.

name: Ultima Shaver
product_description:
Stay well groomed with the Wahl Ultima Shaver, a rechargeable cordless shaver designed to expertly trim and detail your beard.
Delivering a close and comfortable shave, the shaver offers 45 minutes of cordless power from a 60 minute charge, and features a quick charge function that lends you enough power for one shave when you're in a hurry.
Its lift and wash function makes for easy cleaning, so you can enjoy a fresh and hygienic shave every time, and its integrated detailer trimmer defines and outlines your facial hair for a clean, precise and professional-looking finish.
Can be used cordless or via the mains.
The Kit Contains:
Mains/Rechargeable shaver, stubble comb 2mm - 4mm, deluxe travel pouch, power cord, protection cap, cleaning brush.

name: of California Pocket Comb 5.25"
product_description: The Baxter of California Pocket Comb features smoothly tapered teeth with rounded tips that will glide effortlessly through your hair, helping to keep it in pristine condition. Hand crafted using a 12 step manufacturing process, the comb is made from durable cellulose acetate sheets. - L.M.

name: Professional Styling Intelligent Digital Argan Tong (32mm)
product_description:
The Feel the Heat Intelligent Digital Argan Tong (32mm) from Diva Professional is the perfect curling companion for all hair types. Give yourself medium waves or curls with the Argan Oil infused wand, for sleek and silky curls that look and feel much healthier compared to using other heated styling wands.
The Intelligent Digital Argan Tong (32mm) features:
- Instant heat up technology.- Controllable digital heat settings from 110°C to 210°C. - Argan Oil infused wand for smooth, glossy hair.- Auto power-off after an hour of no use. - Built-in heat protection stand.
The heat system within the wand ensures it is heated throughout, for perfectly balanced curls every time. - K.R

name: Undone Waves Straight Barrel Curling Iron
product_description: Achieve perfect tousled curls with the T3 Undone Waves Straight Barrel attachment, compatible with the T3 Twirl and Whirl curling irons. Featuring a Tourmaline and Ceramic coated 1” barrel to prevent frizz and maximize shine, the innovative interchangeable styling tool allows for endless looks with minimal heat damage. Simply click in your chosen barrel and get curling for gorgeous, salon-perfect results.

name: E-Styler Hair Straightening Brush - Orange Blossom
product_description:
Reveal sleek and straight locks with the ikoo E-Styler Hair Straightening Brush. Designed to simultaneously brush and straighten hair, the styler is constructed with 37 individual ceramic plates, which ensure even heat application to hair without the need for any additional styling tools. The styler’s bristles glide through hair with minimal resistance, delivering tug and pain free styling, alongside straight and shiny results.
Heating up in just 1-2 minutes, the brush boasts five varying temperature settings, which allow you to tailor your styling experience specifically to your hair type. The settings range from 150-230 °C, suitable for both fine and thick tresses. Automatically shutting off after 30 minutes, the styler is safe and simple to use.
Expect straight hair that is free from tangles and flyaways, whilst boasting a silky, shiny and satin-like finish.

name: Quasar Clear Rayz for HIM - Titanium
product_description:
Achieve clear and healthy looking skin with Clear Rayz for HIM, a two in one acne tool for men and teenagers, that comprises a blue and red light treatment to target spots and calm inflamed skin. The blue light is clinically proven to kill acne causing bacteria, whilst the red light is anti-inflammatory and encourages healing.
Gentle enough for all skin tones and types, Baby Quasar Clear Rayz for HIM is dermatologist tested and its proven results will eliminate the need for topical products and medication. Free from UV light and harsh chemicals, Clear Rayz has no side effects so is a safe and gentle treatment for even severe acne.

name: PRO Ceramic Hot Brush (18Mm)
product_description: Get salon styled hair with the quick heating Babyliss Pro Ceramic Hot Brush (18mm). The ceramic coated brush lets you create curls, volume and shape to your hair with instant results. The Babyliss Pro Ceramic Hot Brush (18mm) has been designed with a ceramic coated barrel to leave hair soft and smooth after styling. A non slip handle allows you to have full control whilst styling, with the long swivel cord allowing easy movement. The soft brush bristles are replaceable giving the styler a long life. And a multi voltage means you can have perfectly styled hair around the world.

name: Professional Styling Rapida3700PRO Dryer - Purest White
product_description:
Achieve salon-worthy results with the Rapida3700PRO Dryer from Diva Professional Styling. Harnessing 15% more power than the previous model, the 3700PRO is equipped with 2200 watts of power and a long life AC motor, drying hair quickly, evenly and effectively.
The durable hairdryer arrives with four heat settings reaching a maximum heat of 110°C, allowing you to choose an ideal temperature for your hair type. The coldest setting is perfect for locking styles into place. Multiple heat settings and two speed settings help to create a unique styling experience, tailored to you.

name: PRO X2 Volare Clipper - Red
product_description:
The BaByliss Pro X2 Volare Clipper features an innovative micro-serrated X-Grip blade which cuts hair neatly and efficiently, whilst MaxLife PRO engine technology boasts an ultra-low vibration and a lightweight design. With 8 comb guides to allow 8 different lengths of cut, in addition to 3 hours cordless running time without charging and a longer lasting lithium polymer battery.
Driven by high speed technology, this unique clipper boasts innovative LED battery indicator with 3 stages and comes complete with lubricating oil and a cleaning brush to ensure a tidy, effortless cut. K.D.

name: Digital Hot Brush - Coral
product_description:
Sweep away tangles and frizz with the Corioliss Digital Hot Brush; an advanced, heated styling tool that delivers sleek and silky smooth results.  
Designed with ionic technology, it emits negative ions to combat frizz and enhance shine, with massaging bristles to effortlessly tackle knots. A variable temperature setting of up to 230°C allows superior results over regular brushing, working to relax kinks and effectively straighten hair in large sections. Tresses are left feeling soft and polished with gorgeous shine.

name: Professional Styling Radiant Shine Styler - Sunrise
product_description:
Add a gorgeous shine to your hair whilst styling with Diva Professional Styling Radiant Shine Styler in Sunrise. The styler features Korean floating ceramic plates that are infused with Argan Oil, Macadamia Oil and Keratin to give your hair a radiant gloss.
Suitable for all hair types, the styler has variable heat settings ranging from 110°C to 230°C in just 20 seconds. The styling tool allows you to straighten, curl and wave your hair with a snag-free finish. -SA

name: Professional Styling Intelligent Digital Argan Wand (25-13mm)
product_description:
The Feel the Heat Intelligent Digital Argan Wand (25-13mm) from Diva Professional is the perfect curling companion for all hair types. Give yourself the largest drop waves or curls with the Argan Oil infused wand, for sleek and silky curls that look and feel much healthier compared to using other heated styling wands.
The Intelligent Digital Argan Wand (25-13mm) features:
- Instant heat up technology.- Controllable digital heat settings from 110°C to 210°C. - Argan Oil infused wand for smooth, glossy hair.- Auto power-off after an hour of no use. - Built-in heat protection stand.
The heat system within the wand ensures it is heated throughout, for perfectly balanced drop curls every time. - K.R

name: For Men Super Groomer Trimmer - Black/Silver
product_description:
Be your own barber with the BaByliss For Men Super Groomer Trimmer, a rechargeable, professional grade hair trimmer with lithium-ion technology and electro-chemically formed precision blades.
Perfect for achieving a personalised, super-groomed appearance, the trimmer features an ultra-sharp cutting angle for effortless cutting, and five interchangeable heads, including a detail trimmer for lines and shapes, foil shaver for a clean finish, and nose and ear trimmer for those unwanted hairs.
Lightweight and easy to use, its lithium-ion technology ensures power and performance is sustained, even at low charge levels, and its mains and cordless function to offer the ultimate in convenience. - K.N.
Top Top: Before first initial use, the trimmer should be charged continuously for 2 hours to ensure optimum power performance fot smooth, fast trimming every time.

name: Detangle Straightener - Purple
product_description:
Achieve salon-style results in next to no time with the Glamoriser Detangle Straightener, an innovative multi-tasking tool that takes the hard work out of hairstyling. It features curved ceramic plates with integrated heated combs, which work to detangle and smoothen hair whilst straightening to leave you with poker-straight, knot-free locks.    
Infused with Black Diamond Oil to combat frizz and boost shine; the ceramic plates easily glide through hair without snagging or clumping. It features an ultra-fast 15-second heat up time and six variable heat settings from 130°C to 230°C, meaning you can adjust styling to suit varied hair types and minimise damage by limiting the heat exposure to preserve hair’s natural hydration levels.  Achieve ultra-smooth and tamed locks with a healthy-looking shine.

name: Head Jog Titanium Pro-Air Clipper
product_description:
Look sharp with the Electric Head Jog Titanium Pro-Air Clipper, a cordless, rechargeable hair clipper with innovative Stay Cool System for comfortable styling.
Tackling even the thickest of hair, the professional clipper is powered by a rotary motor with intelligent motor control; it runs at the same speed even when cutting thicker hair to prevent snagging. Fitted with a lithium ion battery, it delivers three hours of run time, and can be charged to full in two hours with fast-charge technology. Its titanium blades are sharp and durable, and its Stay Cool System ensures blades stay cool throughout styling for enhanced comfort. Four cutting lengths offer styling versatility, along with two double-sided attachment combs.

name: Quasar Baby Blue
product_description:
Achieve visibly clearer skin with Baby Quasar's Baby Blue; an innovative, easy-to-use light therapy tool that utilises LED light technology to help treat mild to moderate acne, whilst combating spots, breakouts and blemishes.
Crafted from high quality anodised aluminium with an intelligent LED configuration, the high spectral purity of its violet-blue light penetrates into pores to attack breakout-causing bacteria at the deepest level. Safe, gentle and painless, the Baby Blue device glides over facial contours to eliminate problem skin, revealing a healthy-looking, glowing complexion after use.

name: Professional Styling Rapida3700PRO Dryer - Blush
product_description:
Achieve salon-worthy results with the Rapida3700PRO Dryer from Diva Professional Styling. Harnessing 15% more power than the previous model, the 3700PRO is equipped with 2200 watts of power and a long life AC motor, drying hair quickly, evenly and effectively.
The durable hairdryer arrives with four heat settings reaching a maximum heat of 110°C, allowing you to choose an ideal temperature for your hair type. The coldest setting is perfect for locking styles into place. Multiple heat settings and two speed settings help to create a unique styling experience, tailored to you.

name: Chopper Hair Clippers
product_description:
The Corioliss Chopper Hair Clippers feature three interchangeable cutting heads to deliver maximum precision and custom results in on easy to use tool.
Offering a rechargeable lithium battery with up to 90 minutes usage per charge, the versatile hair styling device provides easily removable blades with three sizes to suit all requirements for optimum functionality, ultra-smooth angles and to catch even the smallest hairs.
Four combs allow for cuts and shades at different lengths, with a cleaning brush and lubricating oil to ensure efficient and easy maintenance.

name: Professional Styling Dynamica4000Pro Dryer - Aurora
product_description:
Dry your hair quickly and effectively with Diva Professional Styling Dynamica4000Pro Dryer in Aurora. The lightweight yet powerful AC dryer has a professional compact barrel design that helps you to achieve an expert blow dry. Helping to reduce the appearance of static and frizz, the dryer has a AC motor to provide high airflow and pressure.
Also featuring a unique Macadamia, Argan and Keratin grille combined with the Super-Ioniser you can be ensured that your hair will be left manageable, soft and shiny. -SA

name: Professional Feel The Heat S5 Elite Argan Oil Styler
product_description:
Leading at the top in hair design, the Diva Professional Feel The Heat S5 Elite Argan Oil Styler is perfect for all hair types.
The Diva Professional Feel The Heat S5 Elite Argan Oil Styler has Korean ceramic plates which have been infused with argan oil, this allows for more control when styling leaving your hair silky smooth.

name: Digital Hot Brush - Grey
product_description:
Sweep away tangles and frizz with the Corioliss Digital Hot Brush; an advanced, heated styling tool that delivers sleek and silky smooth results.  
Designed with ionic technology, it emits negative ions to combat frizz and enhance shine, with massaging bristles to effortlessly tackle knots. A variable temperature setting of up to 230°C allows superior results over regular brushing, working to relax kinks and effectively straighten hair in large sections. Tresses are left feeling soft and polished with gorgeous shine.

name: C2 Straightener - Soft Touch Black
product_description:
Corioliss proudly present a gift set that oozes glamour and endless styling possibilities. The Corioliss C2 Straightener – Soft Touch Black joins a premium quality titanium styling iron, a heat resistant pouch and finger glove, all within a striking gift box.
Leading beauty technology, ultra glam styling with must have accessories make the Corioliss C2 Straightener - Soft Touch Black hot property. Featuring a slim, lightweight ergonomic design, the C2 Straightener forms the centerpiece of this striking set, opening up a whole host of styling options – from waves and flicks to curls and poker straight locks.
The Corioliss C2 Straightener - Soft Touch Black has ultra smooth titanium plates that heat up to 210°c within 20 seconds to provide the perfect sleek finish in one pass. Negative ion technology eliminates static resulting in hair that is soft, silky and shiny. If that wasn’t enough, it also features a 4.2m, 360°c salon approved swivel cord, UK and EU plug adapters and an automatic safety sleep mode after 30 minutes! What more could you need from a styling iron?

name: Professional Inflated Ego Styling Iron
product_description:
Created with state of the art technology, the Inflated Ego Styling Iron by ego Professional works to give you sleek, silky tresses without de-hydrating or damaging. With adjustable temperature settings from 70° to 230°C, this innovative straightener is perfect for all hair types.
Boasting unique HW2 technology to reduce static and retain optimum moisture in the hair, in addition to a cool heat boost to regulate temperature, this styling iron features an ergonomic design to make it easy and comfortable to use. Infused with the cuticle soothing power of the precious stone tourmaline, the 1" ceramic plates glide effortlessly across the hair to give a smooth, long lasting finish.
Auto shut-off technology ensures accidents never happen, whilst the 2.5 metre swivel cord allows for movability. The Inflated Ego Styling Iron will leave your locks conditioned, sleek and salon fresh every time. K.D.

name: Auto Duluxe Arm Blood Pressure Monitor
product_description:
The HoMedics Auto Deluxe Arm Blood Pressure Monitor is the easiest way to check your pulse rate, hypertension and hypotension whilst on the go. Fitting discreetly on the upper arm, it is also small enough and light enough to carry around with you if needed.
The screen's colour has been designed according to the Worlds Health Organisation, making it easily readable by all. - K.R
Standard sized cuff fits arm sized 22-32cm.

name: E-Styler Hair Straightening Brush - Ocean Breeze
product_description:
Reveal sleek and straight locks with the ikoo E-Styler Hair Straightening Brush. Designed to simultaneously brush and straighten hair, the styler is constructed with 37 individual ceramic plates, which ensure even heat application to hair without the need for any additional styling tools. The styler’s bristles glide through hair with minimal resistance, delivering tug and pain free styling, alongside straight and shiny results.
Heating up in just 1-2 minutes, the brush boasts five varying temperature settings, which allow you to tailor your styling experience specifically to your hair type. The settings range from 150-230 °C, suitable for both fine and thick tresses. Automatically shutting off after 30 minutes, the styler is safe and simple to use.
Expect straight hair that is free from tangles and flyaways, whilst boasting a silky, shiny and satin-like finish.

name: PRO Advanced Ceramic Styler - Black
product_description:
Making hair styling headlines the world over with a sleek curved design for easier control, the BaByliss Pro Advanced Ceramic Styler in Black makes straightening and curling easier and faster than ever.
Equipped with advanced floating ceramic plates and nano titanium technology for a smoother, faster performance, the BaByliss Pro Advanced Ceramic Styler in Black has 10 variable heat settings (ranging from 140°c - 230°c) that can be adjusted via a digital temperature display for precise temperature control.
Featuring a unique programmable memory function that allows for easy '1 touch' temperature selection and an automatic safety switch off, the curved body of the BaByliss Pro Advanced Ceramic Styler in Black glides through the hair in one smooth stroke.

name: Professional Styling Intelligent Digital Styler - Magenta
product_description:
Style hair like a professional with the Intelligent Digital Styler from Diva Professional Styling. The straighteners are expertly created with Argan Oil infused ceramic plates, which work to lock in hair that is sleek and shiny.
Reaching heat settings that range from 110° to 235°C in just 10-30 seconds, the straighteners can be used almost instantly and are suitable for all hair types and textures. The intelligent styler comprises an ergonomic design, allowing you to style locks with comfort and ease, whether that be creating luxurious curls or poker straight tresses. Creating styles with staying power, the straight iron features dual voltage, allowing you optimum styling wherever you may be.

name: Head Jog Gold Titanium Waving Iron - 16mm
product_description:
Create beautiful curls with the Electric Head Jog Gold 16mm Titanium Waving Iron, a curling tong with slim, gold-titanium coated barrel to create smooth, shiny curls.
The 16mm barrel creates professional-looking coils that can be brushed out for full-bodied, bouncy curls. It offers variable temperature ranging from 120°C to 230°C, and distributes heat evenly through the barrel for consistent results. High ionic output ensures heat is directed inside the hair, preserving hair's natural moisture and protecting the external structure from drying out.
The curling iron's safety cool tip keeps fingers protected during styling, and its 360° swivel 3 metre power cord makes for easy handling.

name: Lithium Beard Trimmer
product_description:
Keep your facial hair in great shape with the Wahl Lithium Beard Trimmer, a rechargeable, cordless trimmer that utilises lithium ion technology for superior performance.
Delivering 2.5 hours of running time from a single two hour charge, the lightweight and ergonomic beard trimmer cuts closely and comfortably with high precision stainless steel blades, and its variable comb attachment with 7 settings allows you to cut from 2mm - 24mm; ideal for stubble and long beards.
With a quick charge function, it provides one minutes of use when charged for two minutes.
The Kit Contains:
Cleaning brush and oil, storage stand, scissors and beard oil (10ml).

name: Professional Styling Intelligent Digital Argan Wand (32-19mm)
product_description:
The Feel the Heat Intelligent Digital Argan Wand (32-19mm) from Diva Professional is the perfect curling companion for all hair types. Give yourself the largest drop waves or curls with the Argan Oil infused wand, for sleek and silky curls that look and feel much healthier compared to using other heated styling wands.
The Intelligent Digital Argan Wand (32-19mm) features:
- Instant heat up technology.- Controllable digital heat settings from 110°C to 210°C. - Argan Oil infused wand for smooth, glossy hair.- Auto power-off after an hour of no use. - Built-in heat protection stand.
The heat system within the wand ensures it is heated throughout, for perfectly balanced drop curls every time. - K.R

product_description:
The Feel the Heat Intelligent Digital Argan Tong (19mm) from Diva Professional is the perfect curling companion for all hair types. The Intelligent Digital Argan Tong (19mm) features:

The heat system within the wand ensures it is heated throughout, for perfectly balanced curls every time. - K.R

product_description:

Designed to simultaneously brush and straighten hair, the styler is constructed with 37 individual ceramic plates, which ensure even heat application to hair without the need for any additional styling tools. The styler’s bristles glide through hair with minimal resistance, delivering tug and pain free styling, alongside straight and shiny results.
Heating up in just 1-2 minutes, the brush boasts five varying temperature settings, which allow you to tailor your styling experience specifically to your hair type. Expect straight hair that is free from tangles and flyaways, whilst boasting a silky, shiny and satin-like finish.

name: IRIS™ Eye Massager - Black
product_description:
Achieve luminous, youthful-looking eyes with the IRIS™ Eye Massager from FOREO, a brand who specialise in premium beauty devices. Designed with innovative Alternating T-Sonic™ technology, the tool features two modes: a gentle 'Pure Mode' to replicate the feeling of a manual massage and 'Spa Mode', which combines tapping and delicate pulsations for a professional beauty treatment experience.
Crafted from premium, ultra-hygienic silicone that is gentle to the delicate eye contour area, the device prevents bacteria build-up and improves the absorption of skincare products, especially serum and cream. Reduces the appearance of puffiness and dark circles, whilst smoothening crow's feet, fine lines and wrinkles for revitalised eyes.
Fully waterproof and easy to clean, its compact, lightweight design makes the IRIS™ ideal for travelling, so you can refresh eyes on the move. An advanced eye-brightening device with multiple intensity levels to suit individual needs and comfort requirements.

name: Professional Styling StormForce6000Pro Hair Dryer - Pink (Compact Dryer)
product_description:
Helping you achieve salon style results at home, the StormForce6000Pro from Diva Professional Styling is a compact hair dryer with integrated ionic conditioning to achieve a visibly smooth, static-free blow dry.
Powered by an advanced 2400W kinetic motor with exclusive heat boost/heat reduction activation, the dryer offers a superior heat range of 40-110°C and features double the heat settings than a normal dryer for faster, more efficient drying, even on thicker hair.
Combining an easy-hold handle with premium drying power, the hair dryer even includes a true cold shot to set your style in place and create mirror reflecting shine. Fast dry, slim styling concentrators deliver precise styling every time whilst ions help reduce static and frizz for a sleek, controlled finish. - K.N.

name: C1 Hair Straighteners - Marble

product_description: Trim, neaten and style Afro-Caribbean hair and beards with the Wahl What A Shaver Rechargeable Trimmer. Compact and easy to operate, it features high-carbon steel blades that stay sharper for longer, whilst the T-shaped blade helps to prevent ingrowing hairs.

name: C3 Bloom Hair Straighteners
product_description:

Suitable for all hair types, the LED temperature control of 135-235°C allows you to find the perfect heat to match your hair type and styling needs. name: Professional Styling Intelligent Digital Argan Tong (38mm)
product_description:

The Intelligent Digital Argan Tong (38mm) features:
- Instant heat up technology.- Controllable digital heat settings from 110°C to 210°C. - Argan Oil infused wand for smooth, glossy hair.- Auto power-off after an hour of no use. - Built-in heat protection stand.
The heat system within the wand ensures it is heated throughout, for perfectly balanced curls every time. - K.R

product_description:
Braun present the 9-549 Silk-Épil 9 Epilator and Facial Cleansing Brush; an effective epilator for thorough hair removal and a bonus facial cleansing brush that oscillates for pore deep cleansing.

The Facial Cleansing Brush refines and exfoliates with micro-oscillations, helping to remove make-up and impurities to result in refreshed, radiant skin. As well as the epilator, the brush is also 100% waterproof for use in the shower. – E.W.

name: Professional Styling Intelligent Digital Styler - Onyx
product_description:
Style hair like a professional with the Intelligent Digital Styler from Diva Professional Styling. The straighteners are expertly created with Argan Oil infused ceramic plates, which work to lock in hair that is sleek and shiny.
Reaching heat settings that range from 110° to 235°C in just 10-30 seconds, the straighteners can be used almost instantly and are suitable for all hair types and textures. The intelligent styler comprises an ergonomic design, allowing you to style locks with comfort and ease, whether that be creating luxurious curls or poker straight tresses. Creating styles with staying power, the straight iron features dual voltage, allowing you optimum styling wherever you may be.

name: the Heat S3 Argan Slim
product_description:

With an instant, ultra-even heat system running through the whole barrel, waves are always perfectly defined and consistent all day.
Perfect for creating glamorous curls in no time at all, the wave wand with digital heat control is ready to use in seconds, and features a cool tip for control and protection. - K.N.

name: Quasar PLUS
product_description:
Baby Quasar's PLUS is an anti-ageing infrared light therapy device equipped with collagen-building and elastin-strengthening red light technology to promote smoother, younger-looking skin in as little as eight weeks.
Boasting three to four times the power of other light treatment devices, the petite, pain-free facial device combines different shades of red and amber LED lights with infrared light to expertly firm skin and smoothen the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles with long-lasting results. Medical science has proven that applying red and amber lights along with infrared light onto affected skin boosts the production of collagen and elastin. Its smaller treatment head with 3mm LED lights make it convenient to use and highly portable when travelling.
Completely safe, the light therapy treatment is dermatologist recommended and perfect for using at home with no reported side effects.

name: C3 Hair Straighteners - Black
product_description:
Perfect for straightening, curling or waving, the Corioliss C3 Black Hair Straighteners combine a slimline aesthetic with high performance results. Featuring titanium smooth plate technology and extra-long floating plates for perfect contact and heat distribution every time, the irons will glide over your hair smoothly without causing static thanks to innovative negative ion technology.
Less damaging than ceramic plated straighteners, the ergonomic tool features LED digital temperature control to allow heat adjustment from 135°C-235°C to suit your styling needs. Complete with a 3 metre salon standard cord with 360° swivel action. - K.N.

name: LS5560 Lady Shaver Legs and Body
product_description: Designed to effortlessly glide over the contours of your body, the Braun LS5560 Lady Shaver Legs and Body will leave your skin feeling soft and smooth. Boasting double care technology that exfoliates your skin as you shave, it features a rounded head with a floating foil and trimmer that adapts to the shaver's movements. product_description:

The epilator features a unique Dual Comfort System which includes massage rollers and a cooling ice glove that cools the skin before and soothes it after epilation to increase your comfort.

Working to remove impurities, the cleansing brush for the face removes make-up and impurities up to 6 times better than a manual cleanser and leaves your skin smooth and refreshed in just 1 minute. - SA

name: Trinity - Icicle Blue
product_description:
Rediscover a younger, firmer-looking complexion with the NuFACE Trinity in Icicle Blue. Combining a facial toning device with a skin-prepping primer, the duo will contribute to a smoother, lifted and younger-looking complexion with regular use.
Trinity Facial Toning Device - Icicle Blue
An award-winning microcurrent treatment packed into an innovatively-designed device with interchangeable treatment attachments. Designed to combat visible signs of ageing, the device stimulates both the large surface areas and small contours of the face, creating similar results to a facelift, however the treatment is pain free and can take only 5 minutes. Mircrocurrent devices mimic the natural current of the body, which slows as we age. Going deeper than the surface, the device visibly tones the facial muscles, improving the contour, evening the appearance of skin tone and visibly reducing fine lines and wrinkles. Safe and effective for all skin types, it leaves the complexion looking youthful and visibly supple.
Gel Primer (59ml)
Prepare for the NuFACE Trinity device with the Gel Primer. The lightweight formula allows for the device to glide across the skin easily, whilst ensuring maximum microcurrent conductivity for optimum results. Suitable for all skin types, the formula is water-based and extremely easy to remove.

product_description:
Add a gorgeous shine to your hair whilst styling with Diva  Professional Styling Radiant Shine Styler in Aurora. The styler features Korean floating ceramic plates that are infused with Argan Oil,  Macadamia Oil and Keratin to give your a hair a radiant gloss.
Suitable for all hair types, the styler has  variable heat settings  ranging from 110°C to 230°C in just 20 seconds. The styling tool allows  you to straighten, curl and wave your hair with a snag-free finish. -SA

product_description:

The 32mm barrel creates professional-looking, voluptuous curls, and its variable temperature control from 120°C to 230°C evenly distributes heat through the barrel for consistent results. High ionic output ensures heat is directed inside the hair, preserving hair's natural moisture and protecting the external structure from drying out.
The curling iron's safety cool tip keeps fingers protected during styling, and its 360° swivel 3 metre power cord makes for easy handling.

name: Professional Styling Intelligent Digital Argan Beach Curls Wand
product_description:

The heat system within the wand ensures it is heated throughout, for perfectly balanced beach waves all over every time. - K.R

product_description:
Tone and exfoliate your skin with Magnitone London The Full Monty! Daily Skincare Brush, an innovative brush that deeply cleanses the face and body to remove dirt, make-up and excess oil. Powered by double award-winning Vibra-Sonic™ technology, the device features a soft brush head that rotates at 15,000 pulsed oscillations per minute for a pore-penetrating action, revealing a smoother, refined texture.

With five cleansing modes including Body Exfoliation, Pedi-Buff and three facial settings (Sensitive, Daily Cleanse and PulseLift™ Toning), you can customise your daily routine to firm, tighten and reignite a radiant glow from head to toe (literally!).

Enhances the absorption of skincare products, especially serum and cream. Complete with three interchangeable brush heads: 'Active Clean' brush head for facial cleansing, 'The Exfoliator' head for body buffing and 'Well Heeled' to remove rough skin on the feet. E.N.
