name: SE80-M Silk Face Epilator Refill
product_description: Designed for the Braun Face device, the SE80-M Silk Face Epilator Refill pack includes four different brushes to tailor your facial cleansing to your specific skin needs. The Normal Brush removes make-up and impurities up to six times better than manual cleansing, the Exfoliation Brush gently sweeps away dead skin cells to visibly refine the skin, the Beauty Sponge helps to massage cream or serum into the skin or can be used to apply make-up evenly, and the Extra Sensitive Brush gently cleanses particularly delicate, dry or sensitive skin. – E.W.

name: London Well Heeled! Express Pedicure System - Pastel Green
product_description:
Pamper hardworking feet with the Magnitone London Well Heeled! - Express Pedicure System; an effective green device that gently buffs away dry, hard and rough skin from feet.
Crafted with a dome-shaped, micro-crystal roller, the system is able to reach around the curves of the feet to ensure each area of skin is treated. The pedicure system arrives with two roller heads, the regular roller for general buffing and the extra-buff head, which is designed to tackle to most stubborn and rough areas of skin.
Gliding over feet, the device buffs skin to perfection, leaving feet, toes and heels soft, smooth and comfortable. The lightweight device is battery powered and is ideal for taking on-the-go. Expect a salon-worthy pedicure in an instant.

name: Advance Light Ceramic Ionic Hair Dryer - Black
product_description:
Achieve salon-worthy results with the Advance Light Ceramic Ionic Hair Dryer - Black from Parlux. Delivering superior performance, the Advance hair dryer aims to meet hairdressing standards to allow for a professional blow dry.
The hair dryer is host to Parlux’s innovative 2200 Watt ‘K-ADVANCE’ motor, which is powerful and durable; shortening the time it takes to dry hair, whilst extending the lifespan of the dryer.
Exceptionally lightweight, the hairdryer was crafted with the user in mind. The styling tool boasts a built-in silencer, ‘soft touch’ switches and anti-heat casing to ensure a more comfortable hold and drying experience overall. Utilising ionic ceramic technology, the dryer guarantees to leave hair healthy, shiny and static-free.

name: PRO Attitude Porcelain Crimper (2.5 Inch)
product_description:
Create hair with attitude, the Babyliss Pro Attitude Porcelain Crimper (2.5 inch) gives your hair cutting edge crimped styles, texture and waves straight from the catwalk.
The Babyliss Pro Attitude Porcelain Crimper (2.5 inch) is the hottest out of the Babyliss range. The 2.5 inch porcelain plates have instant heat, with 25 different heat settings they reach a maximum temperature of 200C. Designed with a longer swivel cord you can move easily whilst styling. This styler is a must have for any hair fashionista!

name: Chromatix - Purple Haze
product_description:
The purple Dynamica3400 Pro Chromatix dryer from Diva Professional is the perfect drying companion for all hair types. Give yourself super smooth, glossy dry locks in no time with the quick-powered 2100 watt hairdryer. Blow dry and style your hair as desired, following with the cool shot button to set hair into shape.
The Dynamica3400 Pro Chromatix features:
- Cool shot button. - 4 heat and 2 speed settings to choose from. - 2100W power. - 3 metre long flexible cable.
The lightweight styling tool makes drying your hair quick and easy, without being left with the achy arm feeling afterwards. - K.R

name: Quasar MD Blue
product_description:
Treat acne with the Baby Quasar MD Blue Light Therapy Device; a scientifically advanced, prescription-strength treatment that’s powered by innovative LED light technology to help you achieve visibly clearer skin.  
Clinically proven and dermatologically tested, the skincare device is safe and easy to use, utilising intelligent light wavelengths to treat the root source of spots and breakouts.
Crafted from high quality anodised aluminium with an intelligent LED configuration, the high spectrum blue light penetrates skin at a deeper level, seeking to kill the infectious bacteria that causes excess sebum production, acne and inflammation.
gentle enough for all skin types, the Quasar MD Blue device has a larger head than the Baby Blue device so you can treat a larger area and cut down your overall treatment time. A pain free and effective acne treatment suitable for teens and adults alike to help you regain confidence and attain a clear complexion.

name: Professional Styling Straight and Style Speed Brush Pro
product_description:
Reduce styling time with the Straight and Style Speed Brush Pro from Diva Professional Styling. Simultaneously straightening and brushing hair, the styler boasts a unique combination of hot and cool bristles, hot to relax and straighten the hair, whilst the cool bristles lock the style into place to produce long-lasting results.
The hot, ceramic bristles are infused with Macadamia, Argan Oil and Keratin, which combine to combat unwanted frizz and static, as well as leaving hair glossy. Not just straightening locks, the styling brush is crafted with grooves to the underside, which are able to add soft curls and flicks to hair.
Suitable for all hair types and textures, the styling tool boasts variable heat settings ranging from 110° to 200°C, allowing you to style at a temperature tailored to your tresses. Complete with dual voltage, the essential Speed Brush Pro will work just as effectively whilst you're on-the-go.

name: Professional Styling Intelligent Digital Styler - Turquoise
product_description:
Style hair like a professional with the Intelligent Digital Styler from Diva Professional Styling. The straighteners are expertly created with Argan Oil infused ceramic plates, which work to lock in hair that is sleek and shiny.
Reaching heat settings that range from 110° to 235°C in just 10-30 seconds, the straighteners can be used almost instantly and are suitable for all hair types and textures. The intelligent styler comprises an ergonomic design, allowing you to style locks with comfort and ease, whether that be creating luxurious curls or poker straight tresses. Creating styles with staying power, the straight iron features dual voltage, allowing you optimum styling wherever you may be.

name: Lithium Ion Power Clipper
product_description:
Look sharp with Wahl's Lithium Ion Power Clipper, a cordless, rechargeable hair clipper that delivers double the power of a standard hair clipper for superior cutting performance.

Tackling even the thickest of hair, the professional clipper utilises lithium ion technology and high carbon steel blades that can cut as close as 0.8mm. It provides 120 minute run time from a full 60 minute charge, and features a quick charge function that delivers 12 minutes of use from a 15 minute charge. Comfortable to hold and easy to control, the clipper is great for full head cuts, or for precision trimming around the ears, sideburns and neckline. Complete with an LED charging indicator and premium accessories.

The Kit Contains:
Clipper, hard storage case, cape, scissors and barber comb, 10 guide combs

Features:

name: Professional Styling Radiant Shine Styler - Twilight
product_description:
Add a gorgeous shine to your hair  whilst styling with Diva  Professional Styling Radiant Shine Styler in Twilight. The styler features Korean floating ceramic plates that are  infused with Argan Oil,  Macadamia Oil and Keratin to give your a hair a  radiant gloss.
Suitable for all hair types, the stylers have variable heat settings   ranging from 110°C to 230°C in just 20 seconds. The styling tool allows   you to straighten, curl and wave your hair with a snag-free finish.  -SA

name: Professional Styling Intelligent Digital Styler - Periwinkle
product_description:
Style hair like a professional with the Intelligent Digital Styler from Diva Professional Styling. The straighteners are expertly created with Argan Oil infused ceramic plates, which work to lock in hair that is sleek and shiny.
Reaching heat settings that range from 110° to 235°C in just 10-30 seconds, the straighteners can be used almost instantly and are suitable for all hair types and textures. The intelligent styler comprises an ergonomic design, allowing you to style locks with comfort and ease, whether that be creating luxurious curls or poker straight tresses. Creating styles with staying power, the straight iron features dual voltage, allowing you optimum styling wherever you may be.

name: Superturbo 2000 - Black
product_description:
A favourite in professional salons, the Parlux Superturbo 2000 - Black is powerful yet lightweight. With a 1440 watt motor, it makes drying your hair a quick and easy process, whilst the two speed and three heat settings allow you to customise the dryer to suit your individual hair type.
Strong and durable, it comes with a concentrator nozzle for close styling and fast drying, whilst the cold shot button will hold your hair in place, for a big and bouncy blow dry. Featuring a long-life motor, this hairdryer guarantees longevity. - L.M.
Please Note: Supplied with a UK 3 pin plug only.

name: Professional Ego Boost Set (Boost Pod, 10 Rollers and 10 Clips)
product_description: The ultimate curling set, the Ego Boost Set by ego Professional boasts a unique heating system infused with HW2 far infra-red technology and the precious stone tourmaline which works to heat up the rollers within just 7 seconds. With a range of differently sized rollers for tight curls to loose waves, the Ego Boost has an easy to use on/off switch and an easy retractable cable to convenient storage. Suitable for all hair types, the Ego Boost works to quickly heat up the soft touch rollers which feature an indicator dot when they've reached their optimum temperature. Perfect for creating quick, easy curls with a lasting finish. K.D.

name: Trinity Facial Toning Device
product_description:
Achieve professional results with the NuFACE Trinity Facial Trainer; an at-home system designed to improve the facial contour, skin tone and wrinkles. The facial trainer arrives with the standard microcurrent attachment for facial toning, alongside a lightweight gel primer, which works in synergy with the device.
Trinity Facial Trainer with Microcurrent Attachment
The award winning NuFACE Trinity Facial Trainer is an effective microcurrent treatment packed into an innovatively-designed device, with interchangeable treatment attachments. Designed as a solution to the visible signs of ageing, the device works to stimulate both the large surface areas and small contours of the face, creating similar results to a facelift, however the treatment is pain free and can take only 5 minutes.
Mircrocurrent devices mimic the natural current of the body, which slows as we age. Going deeper than the surface, the toning device visibly tones the facial muscles, improving the contour, evening the appearance of skin tone and visibly reducing fine lines and wrinkles. Safe and effective for all skin types, NuFACE Trinity leaves the complexion looking youthful and visibly supple.
Gel Primer 59ml
Prepare for the NuFACE Trinity device with the Gel Primer. The lightweight formula allows for the device to glide across the skin easily, whilst ensuring maximum microcurrent conductivity for optimum results. Suitable for all skin types, the formula is water-based and extremely easy to remove.

name: Head Jog Gold Titanium Waving Iron - 19mm
product_description:
Create beautiful curls with the Electric Head Jog Gold 19mm Titanium Waving Iron, a curling tong with slim, gold-titanium coated barrel to create smooth, shiny curls.
The 19mm barrel creates professional-looking, voluptuous curls, and its variable temperature control from 120°C to 230°C evenly distributes heat through the barrel for consistent results. High ionic output ensures heat is directed inside the hair, preserving hair's natural moisture and protecting the external structure from drying out.
The curling iron's safety cool tip keeps fingers protected during styling, and its 360° swivel 3 metre power cord makes for easy handling.

name: WET AND DRY SHAVER SERIES 3-340
product_description:
Tough on three day stubble, yet smooth on skin the Braun Wet & Dry Shaver Series 3-340 can even be used in the shower. The latest generation of the world’s best selling foil shaver the Series 3 is designed for guys who don’t want to compromise.
Thanks to its improved triple action free float system, increased motor speed and new SensoFoil, the Braun Wet & Dry Shaver Series 3-340 can even be used in the shower and with foams and gels! Using SensoFoil for a more efficient shave, the Series 3 has a triple action cutting system to shave progressively closer.
Braun Male Shaver Series 3-340 features:

name: Lithium Blitz Beard Trimmer
product_description:
Keep your beard in top shape with the Wahl Lithium Blitz Beard Trimmer, a 3-in-1 rechargeable beard trimmer that utilises advanced Lithium Ion 2.0 Technology to provide four hours run time from a one hour charge.
Equipped with three interchangeable heads, the versatile beard trimmer allows you to perfectly groom your facial hair. The T-Blade head is ideal for general beard grooming, the Foil Shaver head expertly tidies up strays below the beard, and the Detail Shaver Head allows you to create clean lines and edges for a professional finish.
The trimmer features high precision blade grinding technology for superior cutting performance, and has finer teeth to produce a finer quality cut. Powerful and easy to use, the trimmer also features a quick charge function that delivers three minutes of power after a one minute charge.
The Kit Contains:
Lithium Ion Blitz Rechargeable 3-in-1 Beard Trimmer, 12 guide combs, blade oil and cleaning brush, beard comb, storage stand, soft storage pouch and charger.

name: 130S-1 Shaver
product_description: Designed to give you an ultra close shave, the Braun 130S-1 Shaver features a slim, precision head for a smooth and comfortable shave, even in those hard-to-reach areas. Boasting a foil system, the shaver also features a pop up trimmer for sideburns and moustaches. Designed for dry use, this corded shaver is also ergonomically designed for complete comfort and control. - L.M.

name: Chromatix - Sky Blue
product_description:
The blue Dynamica3400 Pro Chromatix dryer from Diva Professional is the perfect drying companion for all hair types. Give yourself super smooth, glossy dry locks in no time with the quick-powered 2100 watt hairdryer. Blow dry and style your hair as desired, following with the cool shot button to set hair into shape.
The Dynamica3400 Pro Chromatix features:
- Cool shot button. - 4 heat and 2 speed settings to choose from. - 2100W power. - 3 metre long flexible cable.
The lightweight styling tool makes drying your hair quick and easy, without being left with the achy arm feeling afterwards. - K.R

name: London Well Heeled! Express Pedicure System - Pastel Pink
product_description:
Pamper hardworking feet with the Magnitone London Well Heeled! - Express Pedicure System; an effective pink device that gently buffs away dry, hard and rough skin from feet.
Crafted with a dome-shaped, micro-crystal roller, the system is able to reach around the curves of the feet to ensure each area of skin is treated. The pedicure system arrives with two roller heads, the regular roller for general buffing and the extra-buff head, which is designed to tackle to most stubborn and rough areas of skin.
Gliding over feet, the device buffs skin to perfection, leaving feet, toes and heels soft, smooth and comfortable. The lightweight device is battery powered and is ideal for taking on-the-go. Expect a salon-worthy pedicure in an instant.

name: Head Jog Gold Titanium Boho Styler
product_description:
Achieve beachy waves and tousled tresses with the Electric Head Jog Gold Titanium Boho Styler, a gold-titanium coated curling wand that creates loose, natural-looking curls.
Easy-to-use with its wrap and style function, the curling tongs offer variable temperature settings from 120°C and 230°C, and have high ionic output that ensures heat is directed inside the hair, preserving hair's natural moisture and protecting the external structure from drying out. The wand evenly distributes heat through the barrel for consistent results. Hair looks beautifully tousled, healthy and bouncy.

name: PRO Titanium Expression Waving Wand
product_description:
The Titanium Expression Waving Wand by BaByliss Pro is designed to give your hair soft curls and waves with a sleek finish. With advanced ceramic heaters for constant, regulated temperature control, the 34mm barrel is crafted from premium titanium for faster styling. The extended length is perfect for longer hair and the high heat performance ranges up to 210°C to ensure long lasting results.
With a Titanium Ceratherm™ System and 11 digital temperature settings for enhanced hair protection on all hair types, this curling wand is a must have hair styling product. Quick, easy and efficient, it comes complete with a heat mat and storage compartment. K.D.

name: ISSA™ Pro Set - Lavender
product_description:
Introducing the next generation of dental care, FOREO's ISSA™ Pro Set helps you to achieve a brighter and whiter smile, whilst maintaining healthy gums and protecting from gum recession.
Featuring soft, gentle silicone bristles that resist bacteria build-up and channel 183 high-intensity pulsations per second, the toothbrush cleans the teeth and gums to removes plaque and prevent cavities, without scratching tooth enamel or damaging gums.
Fully waterproof and ultra-hygienic, the sleek, ergonomic ISSA™ has eight speed settings to suit individual needs and a 3D flexible brush head to reach every area of the mouth. Each 1 hour USB charge lasts up to 365 uses.

name: Professional Styling Cutting Edge 5-in-1 Trimmer
product_description:
Take professional action with the Cutting Edge 5-in-1 Trimmer from Diva Professional Styling, a multi-purpose, facial trimmer with professional, high power motor.
With five high performance, stainless steel precision blades, and five professional trimming attachments, including a beard trimmer and design trimmer, the 5-in-1 gadget will leave you feeling in control and stubble free. Four interchangeable T-blade combs allow you freedom and creativity for a customisable trim.
Complete with a compact charging stand. - K.N.

name: Baldfader Mains Clipper
product_description:
Style and trim Afro-Caribbean hair with the Wahl Baldfader Mains Clipper. The perfect tool for intricate designs and skin tight fades, this 9 piece kit contains everything you need to achieve barber-quality results in the comfort of your own home.
Quiet yet powerful, the high-carbon steel blades are long-lasting and give ultra close trimming, allowing you to effortlessly create your desired look.

name: Homepro Basic Mains Clipper
product_description:
The Wahl Homepro Basics Mains Clipper is an easy way to cut, shape and define your hair. The 11 piece set contains everything you need to maintain your style in the comfort of your own home, including four different grade attachments, hair dressing scissors, a styling comb, cleaning brush and oil.
The quiet yet powerful carbon steel-bladed clippers give extra sharpness and are long-lasting, giving you salon-quality results every time.

Contains:

name: Clip N Trim 2 Mains Clipper
product_description:
Powerful yet quiet, the Wahl Clip N Trim 2 Mains Clipper allows to to maintain and trim your hair in the comfort of your own home. The mains operated detailer trimmer blades cut twice as close as the standard clipper blades, whilst the Comfort Grip gives total control.
As well as the main trimmer, the set also contains an array of styling tools such as attachment combs, scissors and oil so you can achieve the perfect look, no matter how intricate your desired style may be.

name: Polished Curls Clip Barrel Curling Iron
product_description: Create tight, sleek curls with the T3 Polished Curls Clip Barrel attachment, compatible with the T3 Twirl and Whirl curling irons. Featuring a Tourmaline and Ceramic coated 1.25” barrel with a clip to prevent frizz and maximize shine, the innovative interchangeable styling tool allows for endless looks with minimal heat damage. Simply click in your chosen barrel and get curling for gorgeous salon-perfect results.

name: Nine The Airshot Hairdryer
product_description:
Achieve salon-worthy results with Cloud Nine's Limited Edition Hair Dryer.
Easy to handle with its lightweight, ergonomic design, the professional hair dryer helps reduce wrist pressure and features high airflow with two nozzle sizes for tailored styling.
Offering unrivalled drying power, the adjustable temperature and speed settings ensure adaptable styling, whilst cool air control helps lock in style and create mirror reflecting shine. Complete with a professional length cord and LED temperature indicator.
High airflow professional dryer.
2 nozzles - 1 x 66mm, 1 x 75mm.
Professional length cord (2.7m).
LED temperature indicator.
Storage hook.
Cool air control/Speed settings.

name: PRO V Blade Precision Trimmer
product_description:
Expertly crafted with hardened Japanese steel blades, the BaByliss Pro V Blade Precision Trimmer boasts a sharp V cutting angle for smooth and easy use.
With two cutting blades and two guide combs, it has a high-power, long-life motor for unbeatable performance. Included is a cleaning brush and blade oil, so you can keep your trimmer in optimum condition. - L.M.Features:

name: PRO V Blade Lithium Clipper
product_description:
The V Blade Lithium Clipper by BaByliss Pro is a lightweight, professional clipper designed to give a salon perfect finish on short or longer length hair. Featuring the highest quality Japanese style blades for a smooth cut, this clipper is suitable for cord or cordless use and only needs 3 hours to fully charge and give 75 minutes of clipping.
Complete with 8 comb guides which gives cutting grades 1-8, this clipper can be used with mains power for convenience and has innovative Lithium-ion technology for sustained power performance when cordless. The 3m cord allows maximum movement, whilst the adjustable taper lever makes for a comfortable cut. The V Blade Lithium Clipper is a must have hair styling tool that promises to give outstanding quality. K.D.

name: C3 Paradise Hair Straighteners
product_description:
Create perfectly styled hair with the Corioliss C3 Paradise Hair Straighteners. With extra-long floating Titanium plates that glide effortlessly through your hair, the straighteners boast negative ion technology that eliminates static for a silky soft finish.
Suitable for all hair types, the LED temperature control of 135-235°C allows you to find the perfect heat to match your hair type and styling needs. Producing lasting results whether you're straightening or adding waves to your hair, the styler also comes with a sleep mode that shuts it down after 30 minutes, so you can leave the house without having to worry if you've left your straighteners on.

name: Professional Styling Rebel Dynamica 4000 Pro Lily Daze
product_description:
Create expert results with the Lily Daze Diva Professional Styling Rebel Dynamaica 4000 Pro; a grey, lightweight hairdryer arriving in a feminine floral print.
Boasting a high-powered, professional AC motor and a compact barrel design, the dryer dries and styles hair both quickly and efficiently. The hairdryer features a Ceramic and Tourmaline front grille, which is coated in Macadamia Oil, Argan Oil and Keratin to provide visible health benefits to locks. Tailor your styling experience to your hair type using the four convenient heat settings and two speed settings.
Complete with Ionic Conditioning, the Dynamaica hairdryer not only dries hair in an instant, but eliminates frizz, flyaways and static to leave locks smooth and sleek.

name: PRO Ceramic Dial-a-Heat Tong (13mm)
product_description:
Say hello to big and bouncy curls with the BaByliss Pro Ceramic Dial a Heat Tong 13mm. The ceramic barrel heats up quickly and distributes the heat evenly through your hair, whilst the 25 temperature settings will ensure you'll have the perfect level of heat for your hair type.
Easy to use, the heat curling tongs feature a cool safety tip and an integrated stand, which reduce the risk of burning your skin or table surfaces. The heat-ready indicator system will tell you when your tongs are ready for use, so you can achieve gorgous, natural-looking curls with minimal effort. - L.M.

name: Quasar Pure Rayz for HIM - Frost
product_description:
Target wrinkles with the Baby Quasar Pure Rayz Anti-Ageing Light Therapy Device for Him; a scientifically advanced, anti-ageing system that’s powered by LED technology to help you achieve visibly younger looking skin.
One of the most powerful FDA-cleared light therapy tools available for home use, the handheld device emits completely harmless wavelengths of Red, Super Red, Amber and Infrared light that penetrate skin at different depths to help stimulate natural levels of collagen and elastin – the building blocks of supple, healthy-looking skin.     
Designed to treat the entire face, the gentle treatment effectively helps lift and smooth the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines over time, without causing irritation, inflammation or skin sensitivity to sunlight.
Clinically proven and dermatologically tested, the ergonomic and compact device is gentle enough for all skin types and easy to use from the comfort of your own home. Follow an eight week initial treatment and unveil a youthful looking complexion without fuss or stress, with only minimal touch-ups required for sustainable results.

name: Nine Original Wand
product_description:
The Cloud Nine Wand is designed to give you professional curls, whatever your hair type, whatever your style. Incorporating all the technology and innovation you’d expect, its 3 temperature settings allow you to tailor the right setting to your hair!
The unique secret ingredient within the barrel of the Cloud Nine Wand gives your hair added shine and lustre! Pick the right setting for your hair type and get glamourous loose curls, big and bouncy curls or tight curls at the touch of a button.

name: PRO V-Blade Precision Clipper
product_description:
Expertly crafted with hardened Japanese steel blades, the BaByliss Pro V-Blade Precision Clipper boasts a sharp V cutting angle for smooth and easy cutting.
With four comb attachments and a 5-position taper lever, the clipper also features a high-power, long-life motor for unbeatable performance. Included is a cleaning brush and blade oil, so you can keep your clipper in optimum condition. - L.M.Features:

name: London The Full Monty! Vibra-Sonic™ Daily Skincare Brush - Electric Blue
product_description:
Tone and exfoliate your skin with Magnitone London The Full Monty! Daily Skincare Brush, an innovative brush that deeply cleanses the face and body to remove dirt, make-up and excess oil. Powered by double award-winning Vibra-Sonic™ technology, the device features a soft brush head that rotates at 15,000 pulsed oscillations per minute for a pore-penetrating action, revealing a smoother, refined texture.
Suitable for all skin types and daily use, the tool stimulates blood circulation to boost natural collagen production, effectively increasing suppleness and restoring a smoother appearance. Ready to do The Full Monty? With five cleansing modes including Body Exfoliation, Pedi-Buff and three facial settings (Sensitive, Daily Cleanse and PulseLift™ Toning), you can customise your daily routine to firm, tighten and reignite a radiant glow from head to toe (literally!).
Fully waterproof and easy to clean, its compact, lightweight design makes the Full Monty! ideal for travelling so you can achieve visibly brighter, clearer and healthier skin on the move. Enhances the absorption of skincare products, especially serum and cream. Complete with three interchangeable brush heads: 'Active Clean' brush head for facial cleansing, 'The Exfoliator' head for body buffing and 'Well Heeled' to remove rough skin on the feet. E.N.

name: Mitchell Limited Edition Metallic Express Ion 3-in-1
product_description:
Discover endless styling possibilities with the Paul Mitchell Limited Edition Metallic Express Ion 3-in-1; a versatile styler with interchangeable heads to create an array of looks. Arriving in a limited edition, metallic rose gold hue, the on-trend styler enhances any hair routine.
The styling tool arrives with three varying ceramic barrels; a reverse tapered cone, which delivers ultra-soft curls, a bubble rod for tousled, beachy waves and a standard curling barrel for a voluminous finish. Each styling head is created using an Express Ion Complex™, which styles hair quickly and efficiently, whilst ensuring a healthy finish with mirror-like shine. Expect enviable waves, curls and volume in an instant.

name: C1 Professional Styling Iron - Black
product_description: The Corioliss C1 Professional Styling Iron in black oozes glamour and endless styling possibilities. Ideal for straightening, curling or creating the perfect flick, the 1” wide iron is ideal for all hair types – even thick, course hair.

name: C2 Straightener - Platinum Zebra
product_description:
Corioliss proudly present a gift set that oozes glamour and endless styling possibilities. The Corioliss C2 Straightener – Platinum Zebra joins a premium quality titanium styling iron, a heat resistant pouch and finger glove, all within a striking gift box.
Leading beauty technology, ultra glam styling with must have accessories make the Corioliss C2 Straightener - Platinum Zebra hot property. Featuring a slim, lightweight ergonomic design, the C2 Straightener forms the centerpiece of this striking set, opening up a whole host of styling options – from waves and flicks to curls and poker straight locks.
The Corioliss C2 Straightener - Platinum Zebra has ultra smooth titanium plates that heat up to 210°c within 20 seconds to provide the perfect sleek finish in one pass. Negative ion technology eliminates static resulting in hair that is soft, silky and shiny. If that wasn’t enough, it also features a 4.2m, 360°c salon approved swivel cord, UK and EU plug adapters and an automatic safety sleep mode after 30 minutes! What more could you need from a styling iron?

name: Big Waves Waver
product_description: Bringing you the looks straight from the catwalk, the Diva Big Waves Waver is a never-been-seen-before styler that can produce a variety of wave sizes in minutes. Grip the hair between the plates and you have an instant deep, big wave – the bigger the better! Continue clamping the Diva Big Waves Waver along the length of a section of hair and in no time you’ll have a gloriously summery mermaid wave! For even bigger waves, lock the plates together and wrap the hair around the outside of styler and you get a big-barrelled tong curl. The ceramic plates are infused with Argan Oil to provide excellent control and shine for a superior finish. A variable heat setting also means that it’s safe on all hair types and it is multi voltage for worldwide use. Features of the Diva Big Waves Waver include:

name: Cruzer 6 Precision
product_description: Keep your moustache, facial hair and side burns groomed to perfection with the Braun Cruzer 6 Precision trimmer. With 5mm and 8mm trimming combs, it will allow for precise trimming. The extra small head will help you to get to those hard-to-reach areas, whilst gliding close to the skin for less irritation. Great for shaping and contouring, the trimmer heads can also be removed for easy cleaning under running water. - L.M.

name: Professional Styling Travel Dryer Vibrant - Fuchsia Rebel Edition
product_description:
Diva Professional Styling Travel Dryer in Fuchsia Rebel Edition helps you to achieve a gorgeous blow dry. The lightweight dryer has a 1000W high performance so you can blow dry your hair in minutes.
With a folding handle, this mini professional dryer has two heat and speed settings and a ergonomic handle for easy styling. Also featuring a removable rear grille, you can maintain the high performance of the dryer for longer. -SA

name: Quasar Clear Rayz
product_description:
Combat acne with the Baby Quasar Clear Rayz; a scientifically advanced, 2-in-1 treatment that’s powered by LED light technology to help you achieve visibly clearer skin. Clinically proven and dermatologically tested, the skincare device is safe and easy to use, utilising intelligent light wavelengths to treat the root source of spots and breakouts.
Set in an ergonomically designed plastic shell, on one side the high spectrum Blue LED's activate chemicals that occur naturally in skin, which then work to kill the bacteria that cause blemishes and acne. On the flip side, the healing Red LED's target healthy hair follicles and help minimise the look of inflammation, redness and scarring.
Free from any negative side effects and gentle enough for all skin types, the Baby Quasar Clear Rayz is a pain free and effective acne treatment suitable for teens and adults alike to help you regain confidence and attain a clear complexion.

name: 3800 Rubberised Hairdryer - Black
product_description: This Diva Professional Veloce 3800 is a sleek and stylish rubberised hairdryer that promises high performance, salon grade quality when it comes to drying and styling your hair. Boasting various settings and functions, this hairdryer also features a professional grade motor, guaranteeing long lasting, durable styling for you. Unleash your inner diva with this innovative hairdryer, which features an ionic conditioning generator that's sure to tame and smooth any frizzy or flyaway hair, guaranteeing you a sleek and glossy finish. Put your faith and your hair in a dryer that can go the distance, and treat yourself to Diva Professional. Product specifications:

name: Lithium Vario Cordless Clipper
product_description:
Maintain a groomed appearance with the Wahl Lithium Vario Cordless Clipper, a rechargeable hair clipper that offers double the power and up to twice the run time of a standard rechargeable clipper.

Utilising revolutionary lithium ion technology, the cordless clipper offers 100 minutes run time with a 60 minute charge, and features precision ground blades for an exceptional, high performance cut. Its extra close cutting blade takes hair down to 0.5cm, and longer styles can make use of the integrated, adjustable, sliding guide combs. Complete with a LED charge indicator.

The Kit Includes:
Lithium Ion Vario clipper with LED charge light, 2x variable attachment combs, storage stand, oil and cleaning brush and soft storage pouch.

Features:

name: Defined Curls Clip Barrel Curling Iron
product_description: Create classic, volumized curls with the T3 Defined Curls Clip Barrel attachment, compatible with the T3 Twirl and Whirl curling irons. Featuring a Tourmaline and Ceramic 1" coated barrel with a clip to prevent frizz and maximize shine, the innovative interchangeable styling tool allows for endless looks with minimal heat damage. Simply click in your chosen barrel and get curling for gorgeous, salon-perfect results.

name: Abs5 Unisex Abdominal Muscle Toner
product_description:
The unisex Slendertone Abs5 belt takes muscle toning to an intensive new level! Firm and strengthen your abdominal muscles with next to no effort at all, using clinically proven EMS toning technology.
The Slendertone Abs5 is a more powerful version of the Slendertone Flex and is engineered to help develop abdominal strength, and tone muscles in the most discreet, easy and comfortable way. It is a convenient way to build flattering abs if you are stretched for time as it can be used anytime, anywhere.
The powerful Slendertone Abs5 belt has an adjustable intensity range from 1 to 130. Wear it whilst doing abdominal crunches, using the specially designed Sports Pro programmes, to get the maximum results from your workout. The Slendertone Abs5 belt comes with 10 abdominal toning programmes, 2 programmes to use during crunches and 2 sports programmes for an intensive workout.
This smart training system with patented technology is adjustable for a 27 to 47 inch waist (69 to 119cm). In an independent user trial the results showed a 49% increase in abdominal strength and a 72% improvement in sit-up performance.

name: Groomsman Pro 3 in 1 Precision Trimmer
product_description:
Perfect for all-round grooming, the Wahl Groomsman Pro 3 In 1 Precision Trimmer features a trimmer, shaver and nose hair trimmer to keep you looking your best all the time. The high carbon steel blades stay sharper for longer, whilst the range of attachments will help you to achieve your ideal look. Ideal for stubble, beards and tidying necklines.
A full charge will also give you 60 minutes of cordless use, meaning you don't have to worry about annoying cables.

name: Advance Hair Dryer - Neon Green
product_description:
Experience quick and easy hair styling with Parlux Advance Hair Dryer in 'Neon Green', an award-winning, super lightweight hair dryer with superior drying power and longer lifespan.
Designed to offer maximum, salon-quality performance with reduced energy consumption, the eco-conscious, technologically advanced hair dryer utilises highly recyclable materials and is fitted with a 2200 watt K-ADVANCE motor for the quickest ever drying time, and features a built-in silencer for quiet styling. Its ionic ceramic technology promotes healthy, static-free hair that looks luscious and conditioned. The multiple speed and temperature settings feature soft touch switches for user comfort, and its anti-heating case makes it comfortable to hold. Complete with a cold shot button for locking in style and shine. Carefully designed handle for perfect balance.

name: Lithium Pro Trimmer
product_description:
Keep your beard looking its best with the Wahl Lithium Pro Trimmer, a rechargeable cordless trimmer powered by lithium ion technology for superior performance.
Perfect for long beards and stubble, the slimline, easy grip device offers 120 minute run time with a quick one hour charge, and features integrated adjustable combs; simply use the slide switch to choose your desired comb length.
The Kit Contains:
Stubble Comb 1.6mm - 24mm, beard Comb 2mm - 24mm, storage stand, charger, oil and cleaning brush.

name: Elite Pro Corded Clipper
product_description:
Maintain a groomed appearance with the Elite Pro Corded Clipper from Wahl, a high performance hair clipper with a powerful and durable motor designed to provide a lifetime of superior haircuts.
The hair clipper utilises self-sharpening precision blades for a faster, more comfortable cut, and SECURE-FIT™ guide combs that are 70% stronger than the brand's standard comb.
The Kit Includes:
Durable storage case, guide comb bag, scissors, barber comb and haircutting cape.

name: For Men Super Beard Trimmer - Navy
product_description:
Show you beard who's boss with the BaByliss For Men Super Beard Trimmer, an advanced trimmer with 15 ultra-precise length settings ranging from 1mm to 15mm to help you maintain your desired facial hair style.
Powered with lithium-ion technology for sustained performance, even at low charge, the electrochemically sharpened blades and manual length control wheel allows you to choose the cut depth you desire and lock it in place for a professional, even trim every time.
Its enhanced lithium-ion battery technology provides advanced cutting and optimum cordless performance, even at low charge. However, if you're caught short and the battery runs down, simply charge for 5 minutes to gain enough power for a single beard trim. Complete with a precision comb guide for ultimate length consistency. - K.N.

name: Professional Styling Ultima5000 Pro Dryer - Purple
product_description:
Achieve salon-worthy results with the Ultima5000 Pro Dryer from Diva Professional Styling. Equipped with 2200 watts of power and a long life AC motor, the hairdryer dries hair with exceptional speed and efficiency, whilst also discouraging static.
The durable hairdryer arrives with four heat settings reaching a maximum heat of 112°C, allowing you to choose an ideal temperature for your hair type. The coldest setting is perfect for locking styles into place. Multiple heat settings and two speed settings help to create a unique and professional styling experience, tailored to you.
Features:

name: Vogue Mains Clipper Black/Satin
product_description:
The Wahl Vogue Mains Clipper Black/Satin is an easy way to cut, shape and define your hair. The 18 piece set contains everything you need to maintain your style in the comfort of your own home, including eight different grade attachments, ear taper combs and scissors.
Mains operated, the quiet yet powerful high carbon steel-bladed clippers give extra sharpness and are long-lasting, whilst the adjustable taper lever allows you to achieve the perfect angle giving you salon-quality results every time.

Contains:

name: For Men Super Clipper XTP
product_description:
Discover effortless cutting performance with the BaByliss for Men Super Clipper XTP; a lightweight clipper that boasts ultra-fast charge and superior cutting. Working on all hair types, the effective clipper is able to tackle even the thickest of hair.
Engineered for ease, the trimmer boasts high-grade Japanese steel blades at a unique, ultra-sharp cutting angle, which glide through hair for smooth and effortlessly cutting. The Super Clipper can trim hair at a variety of lengths and styles; from a grade zero to grade eight.
Arriving with a powerful lithium-ion charging system, the clipper comprises an ultra-fast charging time, taking just two hours to complete a full charge. A full charge is able to deliver 85 minutes or high performance cutting power, which is essentially ten minutes of cordless haircutting per week for up to 8 weeks. Alternatively, the clipper can be powered via the mains, allowing you flexibility and control.

name: Head Jog Gold Titanium Waving Iron - 13mm
product_description:
Create tight curls with the Electric Head Jog Gold 13mm Titanium Waving Iron, a curling tong with slim, gold-titanium coated barrel to create smooth, shiny curls.
The 13mm barrel creates professional-looking ringlets that can be brushed out for full-bodied, bouncy curls. It offers variable temperature ranging from 120°C to 230°C, and distributes heat evenly through the barrel for consistent results. High ionic output ensures heat is directed inside the hair, preserving hair's natural moisture and protecting the external structure from drying out.
The curling iron's safety cool tip keeps fingers protected during styling, and its 360° swivel 3 metre power cord makes for easy handling.

name: Head Jog Nano Ceramic 6000 Hair Dryer - Pink
product_description:
The Electric Head Jog Nano Ceramic 6000 Hair Dryer will help you achieve quick, salon professional results at home.
Easy to handle with its perfectly balanced design, the hairdryer is powered by a 2000 watt motor and utilises nano ceramic technology and ionic conditioning to help prevent heat damage when styling. Helping to improve drying time, the tool has nano ceramic beads embedded into the heating element that generate far-infrared heat for faster, more efficient drying time, whilst locking in moisture and shine. Three temperature and two speed settings ensure adaptable styling, while a cool shot locks in style and creates mirror reflecting shine. Complete with a built-in noise reducer, two concentrator nozzles and a 3 metre salon-length cord.

name: MALE SHAVER SERIES 7-790CC-3
product_description:
Braun Male Saver Series 7 features revolutionary sonic technology that automatically adjusts its power to the density of your beard and delivers an exceptional 10,000 micro vibrations with every stroke - for the ultimate thorough and comfortable shave.
The world's only shaver that automatically reads your face and adjusts its power, the Braun Male Saver Series 7 is the only Braun shaver with 3 different shaving modes: extra sensitive, normal and intensive modes for the different facial zones – for an adjustable shave that best fits your beard and skin. The Braun Male Shaver Series 7 also features the world's only alcohol based 5-step cleaning centre to cleans, de-germ, charge, lubricate and dry your shaver at the touch of a button.
Braun Male Shaver Series 7 features:

name: Professional Styling Intelligent Digital Argan Crimper
product_description:
The Feel the Heat Intelligent Digital Argan Crimper from Diva Professional is the perfect crimping companion for all hair types. Give yourself extra volume and intense crimps with the Argan Oil infused plates, for sleek and silky crimping that looks and feels much healthier compared to using other heated styling tools.
The Intelligent Digital Argan Crimper features:
- Heats up in 10 seconds. - Controllable digital heat settings from 110°C to 220°C. - Argan Oil infused plates for smooth, glossy hair.- Auto power-off after an hour of no use.
The heat system within the crimper ensures it is heated throughout, for perfectly balanced crimping and volume all over. - K.R

name: 5000 Hot Pink (with Wand)
product_description: This Diva Professional Styling Ultima 5000 hairdryer is a high performance, powerful hairdryer that boasts salon quality. Charged with ionic technology, this Ultima 5000 helps to smooth your hair, whilst adding softness and manageability, as well as reduce flyaway hair caused by static. Complete with a wide variety of attachments and a professional motor, this dryer can be tailored to your specifications, so you can personalise your look. For a professional finish for your hair, choose this serious dryer with serious performance. Product specifications:

name: Professional Styling Dynamica4000Pro Dryer - Twilight
product_description:
Dry your hair quickly and effectively with Diva Professional Styling Dynamica4000Pro Dryer in Twilight. The lightweight yet powerful AC dryer has a professional compact barrel design that helps you to achieve an expert blow dry. Helping to reduce the appearance of static and frizz, the dryer has a AC motor to provide high airflow and pressure.
Also featuring a unique Macadamia, Argan and Keratin grille combined with the Super-Ioniser you can be ensured that your hair will be left manageable, soft and shiny. -SA

name: Hot Rollers
product_description: These Diva Professional Stay Hot Rollers are an innovative set of rollers that can be heated within a special unit, in order to give you salon quality gorgeous curls. This set compiles twenty rollers in three different sizes, as well as specific butterfly clips and pins in order to help you keep the rollers in place. These Stay Hot Rollers utilise ionic charge technology, which helps to smooth the hair from root to tip, banishing frizzy and flyaway hair, and replacing it with smooth, silky hair that boasts a glossy shine. Give your hair a perfected finish with these rollers, that will keep your hair looking naturally curly all day long. Product specifications:

name: E-Styler Hair Straightening Brush - Cotton Candy
product_description:
Reveal sleek and straight locks with the ikoo E-Styler Hair Straightening Brush. Designed to simultaneously brush and straighten hair, the styler is constructed with 37 individual ceramic plates, which ensure even heat application to hair without the need for any additional styling tools. The styler’s bristles glide through hair with minimal resistance, delivering tug and pain free styling, alongside straight and shiny results.
Heating up in just 1-2 minutes, the brush boasts five varying temperature settings, which allow you to tailor your styling experience specifically to your hair type. The settings range from 150-230 °C, suitable for both fine and thick tresses. Automatically shutting off after 30 minutes, the styler is safe and simple to use.
Expect straight hair that is free from tangles and flyaways, whilst boasting a silky, shiny and satin-like finish.

name: For Men Super Stubble Trimmer - Black
product_description:
Control your 5 o'clock shadow with the BaByliss For Men Super Stubble Trimmer, an advanced, waterproof shaver with 24 ultra-precise length settings to help you maintain your desired facial hair style.
Powered with lithium-ion technology for sustained performance, even at low charge, the electrochemically sharpened blades and motorised length control allow you to trim and shave professionally, whilst the floating, contouring head tracks the shape of your face for exceptional comfort and precision. An LED screen easily displays length setting and charge level.
The trimmer also features a length memory setting; storing the last setting you used so you can achieve your signature look again and again. - K.N.

name: Professional Styling Rapida3700PRO Dryer - Magenta
product_description:
Achieve salon-worthy results with the Rapida3700PRO Dryer from Diva Professional Styling. Harnessing 15% more power than the previous model, the 3700PRO is equipped with 2200 watts of power and a long life AC motor, drying hair quickly, evenly and effectively.
The durable hairdryer arrives with four heat settings reaching a maximum heat of 110°C, allowing you to choose an ideal temperature for your hair type. The coldest setting is perfect for locking styles into place. Multiple heat settings and two speed settings help to create a unique styling experience, tailored to you.

name: Action Pro Clipper
product_description:
Stay perfectly groomed with the Wahl Action Pro Clipper, a rechargeable hair clipper with complimentary ear and nose trimmer.
Designed to expertly cut hair, the cordless device allows for flexible movement when cutting, and comes with rinseable blades for a fresh, hygienic trim each time. The trimmer lasts up to 60 minutes when fully charged, but can also be used with a cord if power starts to run low. The powerful tool professionally cuts hair into shape and the additional nose and ear trimmer ensures you looked perfectly groomed all-over.
Fitted with an intelligent LED display light for charging visibilty.
The Kit Contains:
Clipper, 8 guides combs, storage case, scissors, barber comb, oil and cleaning brush.

name: C3 Gold Paisley Hair Straightener
product_description:
Create perfectly styled hair with the Corioliss C3 Gold Paisley Hair Straightener. With extra long floating Titanium plates that glide effortlessly through your hair, the straighteners also boast negative ion technology that eliminates static for a silky soft finish.
Suitable for all hair types, the LED temperature control of 135-235°C allows you to find the perfect heat to match your hair type and styling needs. Producing lasting results whether you're straightening or adding waves to your hair, the styler also comes with a sleep mode that shuts it down after 30 minutes, so you can leave the house without having to worry if you've left your straighteners on. - L.M.Features:

name: Series 5 5040S Wet and Dry Shaver
product_description:
Combining power with precision, the Braun Series 5 5040S Wet and Dry Shaver will allow you to achieve a close and comfortable wet or dry shave. Boasting Super Lift and Cut technology where the first blade lifts and the second blade cuts, it also features FlexMotionTec technology to maximise skin contact, even on difficult areas.
With a foil system, it also has a pop up trimmer that's ideal for moustaches and sideburns. Designed for both corded and cordless use, a one hour charge will provide 45 minutes of cordless use, whilst the 5 minute quick charge will provide enough power for one shave. - L.M.

name: Tousled Waves Tapered Barrel Curling Iron
product_description: Achieve effortless beach-inspired locks with the T3 Tousled Waves Tapered Barrel attachment, compatible with the T3 Twirl and Whirl curling irons. Featuring a Tourmaline and Ceramic 1.25"-0.75" coated barrel to prevent frizz and maximize shine, the innovative interchangeable styling tool allows for endless looks with minimal heat damage. Simply click in your chosen barrel and get curling for gorgeous, salon-perfect results.

name: SE3270 Legs and Body Epilator
product_description:
Say hello to soft and smooth skin with the Braun SE3270 Legs and Body Epilator. Boasting a 20 tweezer system for fast results which last and last, it will keep your skin feeling silky for weeks. The SoftLift tips will lift hairs at the roots and guide them to the tweezers, whilst the SmartLight allows you to see even the finest of hairs.
Boasting two speed settings, the epilator features a washable head, and is designed for dry use. There's also a shaver head, a trimmer cap and a 'sensitive area' head for all over body use, whilst the cooling glove will soothe and calm your skin. - L.M.

name: Sonicleanse Facial Cleansing & Exfoliating Brush - White
product_description:
Sonicleanse uses micro-pulsating high frequency sonic cleansing for a deeper, more effective clean. The head pulses at an amazing 10,000 times a minute to gently loosen dirt and oil to cleanse your pores, while being gentle enough to use as part of your daily beauty routine. It’s a revolution in facial cleansing in just 60 seconds.
Rio Sonicleanse takes the effectiveness of daily skincare routines to the next level with advanced micro-pulsating technology. Sonicleanse goes beyond merely rotating; it pulsates at an incredibly high frequency for a superior clean that manual cleansing is simply not able to achieve.
Using micro-pulsating, high frequency technology, the cleansing brush head, with over 44,000 micro-tine soft bristles, oscillating at an incredible 10,000 oscillations 10,000 time per minute to gently loosen dirt and oil for a deeper, far more effective clean.
This deep clean targets the appearance of pores, oily areas, dry skin patches and blemishes.
Sonicleanse can be used daily to help remove the epidermal layer of dry and flaky skin cells and to help remove dirt and grime from deep within the pores, leaving skin feeling and looking refreshed, smoother and revitalised.
Sonicleanse is a facial cleansing device that has benefits for all skin types – including sensitive, dry, combination and oily skin.
Sonicleanse is cordless and is simply charged by placing the unit into the charging cradle. The brush heads are easily attached by simply clicking into place.
The face should be dampened with warm water and a preferred cleansing product applied to either the soft brush head or directly onto the skin. The choice of cleanser is purely down to personal preference.
Sonicleanse offers two skin cleansing programmes – a programme that presents a lower frequency of sonic pulses for a gentle cleanse, and a programme with a high frequency action for a deep-penetrating cleanse.
It is recommended to begin with the lower frequency programme before progressing to the higher frequency programme to allow the skin to adjust to the new sonic cleansing regime.
The lower frequency programme is selected by pressing the main programme button twice. The light will illuminate green when the programme is selected.
The higher frequency programme is selected by pressing the main programme button once. The light will illuminate red when the programme is selected.
For deep-pore cleansing, the unit is simply held gently against the surface of the skin and moved in small circular motions across each treatment area of the face.
Sonicleanse encompasses an in built timer which indicates with a ‘beep’ when it has been used continuously for 20 seconds. At each ‘beep’ it is suggested to move onto the next area.
It is recommended to start with the forehead, and then move onto the nose, chin and finally the cheeks. Sonicleanse will automatically switch off after 60 seconds.
After treatment, the skin can be rinsed clean using warm water and followed with skin serums or moisturisers.

name: ISSA™ mikro Toothbrush - Kiwi
product_description:
Catering specifically for babies aged 0-4 years, FOREO's ISSA™ mikro Toothbrush allows a safe, fun and healthy brushing routine and promotes stronger, healthier gums.
Combining non-abrasive, super-soft silicone bristles with Sonic Pulse Technology, the innovative, colourful device features two modes: a 'Brush' setting to cleanse delicate teeth and gums, and a 'Massage' option that relieves tenderness and teething pain with its gentle vibrations.
Lightweight and ergonomic for a non-slip, comfortable grip, the electric toothbrush has been crafted from bacteria-resistant, food-grade silicone for ultimate hygiene, whilst its encased one-piece design has no detachable parts or sharp edges for superior safety.
An integrated timer indicates when it is time to move to a different section of the mouth, and rewarding Smile Helpers ('Glee' and 'Glum') light up to track brushing time; encouraging even the youngest users to develop good dental care habits. Waterproof and dishwasher-safe for easy cleaning.
